Yakurikiwe nâ€™umuraperi S-Wrap nawe washimishije benshi mu muziki wiganjemo uwo mu njyana ya Trap.
Nel Ngabo ubarizwa muri Kina Music niwe wakurikiye uyu muhanzi ashimisha benshi mu ndirimbo zirimo â€˜Byakorohaâ€™ asoreza kuri â€˜Ya Motemaâ€™ yahuriyemo na P wahoze muri Dream Boyz.
Davis D ugezweho mu ndirimbo â€˜Dedeâ€™ niwe wakurikiyeho yishimirwa mu ndirimbo zitandukanye. Uyu muhanzi yahereye ku yitwa â€˜Biryogoâ€™, â€˜Sosoâ€™, â€˜Sexyâ€™, â€˜Like youâ€™ yahuriyemo na Seyn na Kevin Kade asoreza kuri â€˜Dedeâ€™.

Yahise aha umwanya Platini wahoze muri Dream Boyz usigaye yitwa P, uyu muhanzi aririmba indirimbo ze zirimo â€˜Fata amanoâ€™ yakoranye na Safi Madiba ndetse na â€˜Romeo & Julietâ€™ ya Dream Boyz yahozemo.

Aba bahanzi bakurikiwe na Bulldogg wahise yanzika nâ€™indirimbo ze zirimo â€˜Nkâ€™umusazaâ€™, â€˜Cinemaâ€™ na â€˜Zanaâ€™ na â€˜Mpe Enkoniâ€™. Uyu muhanzi ari mu bishimiwe bikomeye muri iki gitaramo.
Butera Knowless yaje akorera mu ngata uyu muhanzi mu ndirimbo yise â€˜Yudaâ€™, â€˜Nkorahoâ€™, â€˜Sweet Mutimaâ€™, â€˜Blessedâ€™, â€˜Day to dayâ€™.
Uyu muhanzikazi yishimiwe kuva atangiye kugeza asoje kuririmba. Abakunzi be bari bahimbawe ku buryo baririmbanaga nawe kuri buri ndirimbo yose yaririmbaga.
King James niwe washyize akadomo kuri iki gitaramo ahereye ku ndirimbo yise â€˜Icyangombwaâ€™ akajya anyuzamo akaganiriza abafana ababwira ati â€˜muriteguye kubyina?â€™ bose bakiriza icyarimwe bamwereka ko banyotewe no gutaramana nawe.

Uyu muhanzi ari muri bake babashije guhagurutsa buri wese wari uri muri iki gitaramo ndetse yeretswe urukundo mu buryo bukomeye.

Title: Filime zisaga 230 ziri guhatanira kwitabira iserukiramuco rya Mashariki African Film Festival
Body:
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iserukiramuco rya filimi nyafurika, Mashariki African Film Festival rigiye kuba ku nshuro ya gatandatu aho abakora filime bo mu bihugu bitandukanye byo muri Afurika no hanze yaho bazitabira.
Iri serukiramuco ryâ€™uyu mwaka rifite insanganyamatsiko igira iti â€œKagire inkuru (tell the tale)â€. Iyi nsanganyamatsiko yatekerejwe mu rwego rwo gushishikariza kubara inkuru zigisha kandi zubaka umuryango uzira umuze.
Mashariki African Film Festival ni iserukiramuco ngarukamwaka rigamije kumenyekanisha filime zikorerwa muri Afurika ndetse nâ€™izo mu Rwanda no kuzikundisha abanyafurika nâ€™isi yose muri rusange. Uyu mwaka iri serukiramuco rizaba guhera tariki 21 kugeza kuri 27 Werurwe 2020.
Kugeza ubu filime zigera mu 218 zamaze kwiyandikisha zisaba kuzitabira iri serukiramuco, nyuma ya tariki 25 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hazamenyakana filime zabashije kwemererwa kuzitabira Mashariki African Film Festival.
Filime zizerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izakozwe nâ€™abanyafurika kandi zivuga inkuru zerekeranye na Afurika, zikaba zarakozwe nibura guhera muri 2018-2019. Uretse kwerekana filime, hazaba hari gahunda yo gutanga amasomo ajyanye na sinema, guhemba filime nâ€™abakora filime mu byiciro bitandukanye.
Filime zizerekanwa ndetse nyuma yo kwerekanwa hazajya haba umwanya wâ€™ibibazo nâ€™ibisubizo mu gihe uwakoze iyo filime ahari.
â€˜Girls in Cinemaâ€™ ni kimwe mu bizaba bigize Mashariki African Film Festival muri uyu mwaka, iyi ikaba ari gahunda yo gushishikariza umubare munini wâ€™abakobwa kwitabira kujya muri sinema. Hateganyijwe gahunda zo kwigisha abakobwa gukora filime bifashishije telefoni zigezweho (smartphones), nka kimwe mu bikoresha bihendutse ugereranyije nâ€™ibindi bikoresho nkenerwa mu gukora filime.
Mashariki African Film Festival igamije guteza imbere sinema ya Afurika nâ€™inkuru zâ€™Abanyafurika ubwabo ari nazo zerekanwa cyane kurusha izo mu bindi bihugu. Izakorewe hanze ya Afurika zerekanwa muri iri serukiramuco ni izikubiyemo inkuru zivuga kuri Afurika gusa.

Title: Trezzo Mahoro akomeje kwandika izina muri filime iri mu zigezweho kuri Netflix
Body:
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa â€˜Sex Educationâ€™, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Nyuma ya Ncuti Gatwa wubatse izina muri filime yitwa â€˜Sex Educationâ€™, yaciye ibintu kuri Netflix, undi munyarwanda witwa Trezzo Mahoro nawe ari mu bagezweho ku Isi yose muri filime iri guca kuri uru rubuga.
Trezzo Mahoro yavukiye mu Rwanda gusa aba muri Vancouver, muri Canada. Yatangiye kwiyumvamo ibyo gukina filime ari mu mwaka wa nyuma wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye.
Yamamaye muri filime zitandukanye zirimo "The Magicians" yakinnyemo yitwa Ralphie, â€œThe X-Filesâ€ yakinnyemo yitwa Crewman ya Fox, "iZombie" yakinnyemo yitwa Darius, ubu agezweho muri filime Nyamerika yitwa â€˜To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love Youâ€™ ica kuri Netflix akinamo yitwa Lucas.
Iyi filime ni igice gishya kuko yabanjirijwe nâ€™ikindi cyitwaga â€˜To All the Boys Iâ€™ve Loved Beforeâ€™ yagiye hanze muri 2018.
Yanditse ikomowe ku gitabo cyâ€™umwanditsi wâ€™Umunyamerika witwa Jenny Han, yayobowe na Michael Fimognari yandikwa na Sofia Alvarez na J. Mills Goodloe.
Ivuga ku nkuru yâ€™umukobwa wagiye akunda abahungu bagiye bahura mu bihe bitandukanye, akajya abandikira amabaruwa noneho rimwe murumuna we aza kuyafata ayoherereza ba bahungu batanu baba barakundanye na we.
Umwe muri bo akaza kumubwira ngo bakundane ariko ari ukubeshya bagira ngo batere ishyari umukobwa baba basanzwe bakundana uba wamwanze, agace ka mbere karangira aba bombi baratangiye gukundana bya nyabyo.
Mu gace ka kabiri barakomeza bagakundana ariko hakaza undi muhungu bari baroherereje ibaruwa akanamusubiza nyuma bakaza guhurira ahantu bakagerageza gukundana ariko umukobwa akaza gusanga bitakunda.
Trezzo Mahoro[Lucas] aba ari umwe mu nshuti zâ€™uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe witwa Lana Condor uba akinamo yitwa Lara Jean, aba ari mu bo yigeze gukunda ndetse akanamwandikira ariko Lucas akamwanga kuko aba ari umutinganyi.
Trezzo Mahoro afite imyaka 23. Icyo ahuriyeho na Ncuti Gatwa nawe uherutse kwamamara cyane muri Sex Education ndetse ukurikirwa nâ€™abasaga miliyoni ebyiri kuri Instagram, nâ€™uko muri izi filime zatumye bamenyekana cyane bose bazikinamo ari abakundana bahuje ibitsina [abatinganyi].
Reba agace gato ka â€˜To All the Boys: P.S. I Still Love Youâ€™, filime iri ku bica bigacika kuri Netflix yakinnyemo umunyarwanda

Body:
Ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare 2020 Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yegukanye igihembo cya Filime nziza â€œBest Filmâ€ mu iserukiramuco rikomeye ryitwa â€œBerlinale 2020â€ [ Berlin International Film Festival] ryabaga ku nshuro ya 70.

Berlinale [Berlin International Film Festival] ni iserukiramuco mpuzamahanga rya Filime rikomeye mu gihugu cyâ€™u Budage no ku mugabane wâ€™u Burayi yabaga ku nshuro ya 70.
Berlinale muri uyu mwaka yatangiye tariki Tariki 20 Gashyantare izageza ku itariki ya 1 Werurwe 2020. Aha Filime â€˜Notre-Dame du Nilâ€™ yakomotse ku gitabo cya Mukasonga Scholastique ikaba yegukanye igihembo cya filimi nziza â€œBest Film â€œ.
Iyi filime yashibutse ku gitabo cyanditswe na Mukasonga, Umunyarwandakazi uba mu Bufaransa cyasohotse mu 2012, kigahabwa ibihembo mpuzamahanga bibiri ari byo Prix Renaudot na Prix Ahmadou Kourouma.

Nyuma yâ€™imyaka umunani iki gitabo gisohotse, ikigo gikora filime cyitwa Les Films du Tambour kiyobowe na Marie Legrand na Rani Massalha, bari kumwe nâ€™umuhanga mu gutunganya filime Atiq Rahimi, baje mu Rwanda gukora filime ishingiye kuri iki gitabo.
Iyi filime yakiniwe mu Karere ka Musanze no muri Rutsiro ku Ishuri rya Murunda, igaragarano abakobwa bâ€™Abanyarwandakazi bagera kuri 20 barimo Amanda Mugabekazi, Malaika Uwamahoro, Albina Sydney Kirenga, Rubango Belinda na Clariella Bizimana.

Title: Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro bageze mu Rwanda aho bagiye gukorera ibitaramo bikomeye (Video)
Body:
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Abahanzi bamaze kubaka izina mu buryo bukomeye mu muziki wo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana, Adrien Misigaro na Gentil Misigaro baje mu Rwanda aho bitabiriye ibitaramo bazahuriramo na Israel Mbonyi.
Aba bahanzi bageze ku kibuga cyâ€™indege cya Kanombe ku mugoroba wo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 28 Gashyantare bari kumwe nâ€™irindi tsinda ryâ€™abaririmbyi bazafatanya nabo.
Adrien Misigaro yabwiye itangazamakuru ko yababajwe cyane no gufungwa kwa Fireman nubwo ntacyo yari kubikoraho kuko gahunda zagombaga gukomeza mu gihe umuntu yaguye mu makosa.
Ati â€œNkâ€™umukozi wâ€™Imana ndamusengera nta kindi kintu nabivugaho, gahunda za leta zigomba gukomeza kuko umuntu iyo ari mu makosa aba agomba gufungwa yaba arengana akarenganurwa. Hari gahunda tuzakorana, hari nâ€™indirimbo ze twakoze.â€
Gentil Misigaro we yavuze ko yari akumbuye mu Rwanda ndetse anagaragaza ko ari ahantu ahoza ku mutima cyane ko yanaje yambaye imyambaro yahakorewe.
Mu mwaka wa 2019 nibwo Adrien Misigaro yagiye gusura urubyiruko ruri kugororerwa i Iwawa, iki gihe uyu muhanzi yavuyeyo atangije Ubukangurambaga yise â€œMelody of New Hopeâ€ bugamije gukangurira urubyiruko rutandukanye kwirinda no kwitandukanya nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge.
Asubiye muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, aho asanzwe atuye, uyu muhanzi uri mu bagezweho muri Diaspora mu bakora indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana yasobanuriye ubuyobozi bwâ€™itorero asengeramo ibyo avuyemo mu Rwanda.
Nyuma yo kwishimira iki gikorwa yatangije, ubuyobozi bwâ€™Itorero asanzwe asengeramo muri Amerika bwiyemeje kumutera ingabo mu bitugu bukamushyigikira ndetse kugeza ubu uhereye ku muyobozi wâ€™iri torero nâ€™abandi bakozi bâ€™Imana bafatanya umurimo bazamuherekeza mu bitaramo ateganya gukorera mu Rwanda muri Werurwe 2020.
Ibi bitaramo byiswe â€œEach one reach oneâ€ byateguwe mu rwego rwo gukangurira buri wese mu banyarwanda kuba bafasha byibuza umuntu umwe wabaswe nâ€™ibiyobyabwenge kubivamo bityo bigafasha kwihutisha ubukangurambaga bwa â€œMelody of New Hopeâ€.

Title: TMC yerekeje muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika
Body:

Kuva mu minsi ishize umwuka wagiye uba mubi mu itsinda rya Dream Boys, abakurikiranira hafi ibyâ€™umuziki bagahamya ko iri tsinda riri mu marembera.
Uyu mwuka wazamutse ubwo TMC yari amaze kumurika igitabo cyâ€™ubushakashatsi yari yarakoze arangiza icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza. Iki gihe mu kiganiro na IGIHE yavuze ko yifuza gukomeza amasomo ye ariko byaba byiza akiga hanze yâ€™u Rwanda.
Nyuma yâ€™aya magambo abantu banyuranye batangiye kubona ko abagize Dream Boys badahuje intego ndetse bitizwa umurindi nuko nyuma buri wese muri iri tsinda yatangiye kwikorana umuziki ku giti cye.
Platini yahinduye izina yitwa P uyu akaba yarasohoye indirimbo zinyuranye wenyine atari kumwe na TMC mu gihe nâ€™undi nawe hari izo yakoze wenyine.
Muri iyi minsi Platini ari kugaragara wenyine mu kazi ka Tour du Rwanda aho ari gukorana na CANAL+ benshi bari batangiye kwibaza igihatse ibi byose.
 Kugeza ubu TMC yamaze kwerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, hakaba hari nâ€™amakuru ahamya ko uyu muhanzi atazagaruka mu Rwanda ukundi ahubwo agiye gushaka uko yakomerezayo amasomo ye.
Icyakora ubwo yahagurukaga i Kanombe TMC yagiranye ikiganiro kigufi na IGIHE ashimangira ko agiye muri Amerika ariko atagiye burundu.
Uyu muhanzi yagize atiâ€ Ngiye muri Amerika muri gahunda zanjye, mugenzi wanjye Platini arabizi yewe ntanikibazo na kimwe gihari.â€
Yakomeje agira atiâ€ Gahunda zanjye nizirangira nzagaruka kandi si cyera, wenda bizanafata icyumweru kimwe.â€
Gusa nubwo TMC avuga ko atagiye guhera muri Amerika ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi siko babifata bitewe nuko umwuka wari uhagaze mu itsinda.
Dream Boys ni itsinda ryâ€™umuziki rigizwe nâ€™abasore babiri aribo Mujyanama Claude uzwi nka TMC ndetse na Nemeye Platini wamenyekanye nka Platini.
Aba basore bamaze imyaka irenga icumi bakorana umuziki bakunzwe mu ndirimbo zinyuranye cyane ko bafite album zirenga esheshatu zose zamaze gusohoka ndetse bamurikiye abakunzi babo.

Title: Miss Nishimwe Naomie yasubije abamwibasiye kubera amanota yagize mu kizamini cya Leta
Body:
Nyuma yâ€™uko amanota yâ€™ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Nyuma yâ€™uko amanota yâ€™ibizamini bisoza amashuri yisumbuye agiye hanze, ku mbuga nkoranyambaga benshi bibasiye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu 2020 Nishimwe Naomie bamunenga kugira amanota make.
Uyu mukobwa yatorewe kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu mpera zâ€™icyumweru gishize yambikwa ikamba mu birori byabereye mu Intare Conference Arena, asimbura Nimwiza Meghan.
Impamvu yo kwibasira uyu mukobwa ni uko ubusanzwe byari bimaze kumenyerwa ko benshi muri ba Nyampinga bâ€™u Rwanda batsindaga ibizamini bya leta ku manota yo hejuru, ariko we yagize 13 mu Mibare, Ubukungu nâ€™Ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi.
Mu kiganiro Amahumbezi kuri Radiyo Rwanda, Nishimwe Naomie yabajijwe icyo avuga ku bantu bamunenze ko yagize amanota make mu kizamini cya leta.
Ati â€œNtabwo ushobora kubuza abantu kuvuga, hari nâ€™igihe wakora ibyiza nâ€™ubundi bakavuga. Njye rero ubu ndi kureba ibikorwa byanjye nta kindi nitayeho [â€¦] biriya ni ahahise hanjye ubu ndi kubaho byâ€™aka kanya, ndi kureba ubuzima ndi kubaho aka kanya.â€
Abajijwe uko yakiriye amanota yagize, Nishimwe yavuze ko nawe atashimishijwe nâ€™uko yitwaye mu bizamini bya leta gusa ko yabikoze nyuma yâ€™igihe ahuye nâ€™uburwayi bukomeye ku buryo ashimira Imana kuba akiriho.
 Ati â€œUko mwabibonye nanjye niko nabibonye, sinishimiye amanota nagize, si impamvu ngiye gutanga ariko ubuyobozi bwâ€™ikigo cyanjye burabizi. Umwaka nakozemo ikizamini ni umwaka narwayemo cyane nubwo ariko na none ntabigira impamvu. Byibuza ndashima Imana ko nkiriho.â€
Nishimwe Naomie yigaga muri Glory Secondary School, yarangije mu mwaka wa 2019 mu ishami rya MEG.

Title: Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo bakoze mu rurimi rwâ€™Ikirashi
Body:
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Abahanzi babiri bavuka mu Karere ka Kirehe aribo Senderi Hit na Intore Tuyisenge basohoye indirimbo iririmbwe mu rurimi shami ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi mu rwego rwo kumenyekanisha uru rurimi banarurinda kuzimira.
Iyi ndirimbo bayisohoye kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21Gashyantare 2020 ubwo hizihizwaga umunsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire. Uyu munsi ukaba warizihirijwe mu Karere ka Kirehe ahahawe umwanya ururimi shami rwâ€™ikinyarwanda rukoreshwa na bamwe mu baturage bo mu Karere ka Kirehe ruzwi nkâ€™Ikirashi.
Abaturage bakoresha uru rurimi bahawe umwanya baganira banabyina imbyino zitandukanye ziririmbwe muri uru rurimi rwâ€™ururashi. Abaturage bahimbawe cyane nyuma yo kumva ko abahanzi babiri bakomoka muri aka Karere babakoreye indirimbo bise Ikirashi aho bafatanyije nabo mu kuyibyina.
Senderi yavuze ko iyi ndirimbo bayikoze bagira ngo bashimire leta ku iterambere imaze kugeza ku baturage bavuga ikirashi.
Yagize ati â€œMbere 1994 abaturage bavuga Ikirashi bari babayeho nabi bamwe barwaye imvunja ibirenge bikitambika none ubu batujwe mu midugudu bahabwa agaciro ntabwo bakibayeho nka mbere.â€
Yongeyeho ati â€œIkindi twayikoze kubera uyu munsi mpuzamahanga wâ€™ururimi kavukire kugira ngo abantu bareke kwibagirwa indimi zacu gakondo.â€
Yavuze ko gufata amafaranga yabo bakayasohoramo indirimbo ari ukugira ngo bakomeze guteza imbere uru rurimi kugira ngo rwoye kuzima ahubwo abantu bakomeze baruvuge.
Intore Tuyisenge we yavuze ko bakimara kumenya ko uyu munsi mpuzamahanga uzizihirizwa mu Karere ka Kirehe barebye umusanzu batanga bagasanga bakwiye gukora indirimbo ishishikariza abantu gukomeza kwibuka ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi.
Ati â€œIyo ururimi rutabungabunzwe rurazimira, njye na Senderi twahisemo rero gukora iyi ndirimbo kugira ngo turusigasire. Iyo tuvuze Ikirashi bimfasha kwibuka abakurambere bacu muri aka Karere tuvukamo kuko nirwo bavugaga nubwo twe tutagize amahirwe yo kurumenya neza.â€
Tuyisenge yavuze ko bagiye kongera imbaraga mu kurusakaza kugira ngo rumenyekane cyane. Yavuze ko kuri ubu inyinshi mu ndirimbo ze azajya agerageza agashyiramo amagambo make yâ€™ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi.
Abakuze bakoresha ururimi rwâ€™Ikirashi bafite agahinda baterwa nuko abato batagishaka kurumenya ngo kuko ku ishuri batarukoresha bakibaza uburyo nibasaza ruzakendera bikabababaza.
IGIHE yaganiriye na bamwe mu barukoresha batubwira amagambo amwe namwe nâ€™ibisobanuro byayo mu Kinyarwanda.
Gusuhuzanya mu Kirashi iyo ari mu gitondo bakoresha â€˜Murayire ge, haba hacyeye bagakoresha â€˜Agandaâ€™ cyangwa â€˜Musibire geâ€™ kubwira umuntu uti â€œAmakuru ki uvuga Agandi shi, Mwiriwe mute bavuga Mwasiba kurungi. Iyo ushaka kubwira umuntu uti uvuye he bakoresha Waruga hi, muryoherwe ni Munuriwe.
Ibice byâ€™umubiri nkâ€™izuru ryitwa Enyindo, ukutwi ni ugutwi, irisho ni ijisho, urutoki rwâ€™insina ni Engemu, amasaka yitwa umugusha, amashaza akitwa ubushaza, ibishyimbo byitwa ibiharage, ibitoki ni ibitiki ihene ni Embuzi, inka ni Ente.

Body:

Title: USA: Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi yahamijwe ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu
Body:
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore nâ€™abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, rwahamije Harvey Weinstein wamamaye mu gutunganya filimi muri Hollywood ibyaha byo gufata ku ngufu abagore nâ€™abakobwa yakinishaga filimi.
Urukiko rukuru rwo muri Leta ya New York rwamuhamije icyaha cyo mu rwego rwa mbere cyo guhatira imibonano yo mu kanwa, Miriam Harey wari umwungirije mu bijyanye no gutunganya filimi mu 2006.
Ni icyaha gihanishwa igihano kuva ku myaka itanu kugeza kuri 25 yâ€™igifungo. Hari ikindi cyaha yahamijwe cyâ€™umugore yafatiye muri Hotel yâ€™i New York mu 2013 gihanishwa igihano kitari munsi yâ€™imyaka ine.
Icyakora Weinstein wâ€™imyaka 67 yâ€™amavuko yahanaguweho ibindi byaha bitatu birimo bibiri bikomeye byo mu rwego rwa mbere byashoboraga gutuma afungwa burundu. Nyuma yâ€™urubanza uwo mugabo yasubijwe mu buroko gufungwa byâ€™agateganyo mu gihe ategereje isomwa ryâ€™urubanza ku Itariki 11 Werurwe 2020.
Aracyakurikiranyweho ibyaha byâ€™abagore babiri bo muri leta ya Los Angeles yafashe ku ngufu mu 2013. Abagore barenga 80 barimo ibyamamare mu gukina filimi nâ€™abana bamusabaga ubufasha ngo abagire ibyamamare bashinja uyu mugabo kubakorera ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Gukurikiranwa kâ€™uyu mugabo byatijwe umurindi nâ€™ubukangurambaga bwiswe MeToo bukangurira abagore kujyana mu butabera abagabo bakomeye bitwaza icyo bari cyo bagahohotera abagore.
Weinstein yamenyakanye cyane muri filimi yiswe Pulp Fiction yo mu 1994 ivuga ku byaha byâ€™ubujura, iyitwa The English Patient yo mu 1996 na Shakespeare in Love 1998 zombi zivuga ku rukundo.
Haleyi, wakoraga kuri imwe mu mateleviziyo Weinstein yavuze ko yamuhohoteye ubwo yamutumiraga mu nzu ye iri Manhattan. Yatanze ubuhamya avuga ko yamujyanye ku buriri akamwikubaho. Ni mu gihe Mann yavuze ko yamusuzuguraga cyane mu mubano wabo utarimo imibonano mpuzabitsina kugeza ubwo amufashe ku ngufu mu 2013.
Michelle Simpson Tuegel uhagarariye abahohotewe, mu rukiko yavuze ko yizeye ko nâ€™abandi bagore barakomeza kuzana abakora ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina mu nkiko.
Ati "Imbaraga umuntu yaba afite zose turi mu bihe bishya. igihe cya #MeToo kije gutamaza abakoresha imbaraga bafite mu guhohotera abagore."
Miriam Haley ubu ufite imyaka 42 yâ€™amavuko avuga ko yahohotewe na Harvey ytwaje kumufasha kuguma mu kazi ke ko kumwungiriza. Yamufashe ku ngufu ku itariki 10 Nyakanga 2006.

Title: U Butaliyani: Umuntu wa karindwi yishwe na Coronavirus
Body:
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa nâ€™icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje ko abantu barindwi aribo bamaze guhitanwa nâ€™icyorezo cya Cronavirus, gikomeje guhitana benshi mu Bushinwa ariko cyageze no mu Burayi.
Ubuyobozi bwâ€™u Butaliyani bwatangaje kuri uyu wa Mbere ko bwahagaritse amashuri, za kaminuza, inzu ndangamurage nâ€™ibindi bikorwa bihuriza abantu hamwe nkâ€™imikino yâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru nâ€™ibikorwa ndangamuco.
Ibiro ntaramakuru byâ€™u Butaliyani, Ansa byatangaje ko umuntu wa karindwi yazize iyi ndwara, ikomeje kwibasira u Butaliyani bwâ€™amajyaruguru.
Byatangajwe ko umuntu witabye Imana ari umugabo wâ€™imyaka 80, wajyanwe mu bitaro mu cyumweru gishize mu mujyi wa Lodi, kubera indwara yâ€™umutima nkâ€™uko Reuters yabitangaje. Abaganga bavuga ko ashobora kuba yarandujwe Coronavirus nâ€™undi murwayi.
Umubare wâ€™abarimo guhitanwa nâ€™iyi ndwara ukomeje kwiyongera, mu gihe umuntu wa mbere wahitanwe na Cornavirus mu Butaliyani yapfuye ku wa Gatanu.
Abayobozi bavuga ko mu Bushinwa abantu bamaze kwandura ari 77 269 naho abanduye hanze yabwo ni 2 271. Abamaze guhitanbwa nayo ni 2 596, barimo 33 bamaze kugwa mu mahanga.
Kugeza ubu abantu bamaze gukira ni 24 854.

Title: Ibidasanzwe byaranze Miss Nishimwe Naomie ubwo yigaga mu mashuri yisumbuye
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ryâ€™uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti nâ€™abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020, izina ryâ€™uyu mukobwa ryabaye ikimenyabose ritera ibyishimo abo mu muryango we inshuti nâ€™abamumenyeye mu irushanwa, ku ishuri aho uyu mukobwa yize ho biba ibindi.
Nyuma yuko hamenyekanye Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020, twifuje kumenya uyu mukobwa guhera mu bwana maze biba ngombwa ko tujya ku ishuri aho yarangirije amashuri yisumbuye tugirana ikiganiro nâ€™ubuyobozi bwâ€™ikigo ndetse nâ€™abanyeshuri babanye nawe.
Sibomana Alphonse, umuyobozi wâ€™ishuri rya Glory Secondary School aho Nishimwe Naomie yize kuva mu wa kabiri wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije muri MEG (Maths-Economics-Geography) mu mwaka wa 2019, yabwiye IGIHE ko batatunguwe nuko uyu mukobwa yegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda cyane ko ari umukobwa mwiza, uzi ubwenge kandi wâ€™intangarugero mu myitwarire.
Yavuze ko Nishimwe ari umukobwa uzi kuvugira mu ruhame, bikaba imwe mu ndangagaciro zigishwa abanyeshuri babo kugira ngo bazagire icyo bigezaho mu buzima.
Yagize atiâ€Twe tugira Ministeri zitandukanye, harimo iyâ€™umuco na siporo kenshi rero bakunda kugira amarushanwa yâ€™abanyempano atuma abana bitinyuka bakagaragaza impano zabo, ishinzwe gutegura abanyeshuri kuzavamo abayobozi beza bâ€™ejo hazaza iyi ikaba urebye ifasha abanyeshuri gutinyuka kuvugira mu ruhame, nâ€™izindi. â€
Uyu muyobozi yavuze ko ubumenyi Nishimwe Naomie yakuye muri iri shuri aribwo bwamufashije no mu rugendo rwe rwo kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda.
Sibomana yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa ubusanzwe imico ye yari nta makemwa ku ishuri cyane ko nta kosa yari yagafatiwemo iryo ariryo ryose ryari gutuma yatumwa nkâ€™umubyeyi cyangwa akirukanwa.
Ati â€œNaomie yize hano kuva mu wa kabiri wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye kugeza arangije, yari umukobwa uzwiho gusetsa cyane, nta makosa yakunze kumuranga mu buzima bwe bwo ku ishuri.â€
Yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yari afite imyitwarire myiza ku buryo abarezi nâ€™abanyeshuri bagenzi be babimukundiraga ndetse byatumye banamuba hafi mu rugendo rwe rwo kwiyamamariza kuba Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda.
Mu bijyanye nâ€™amasomo, umuyobozi wâ€™iri shuri yavuze ko uyu mukobwa yatsindaga neza, atiâ€ Dufite amanota tugenderaho twimura abanyeshuri, Naomie ntiyigeze asibira nâ€™umunsi wa rimwe, urumva ko yatsindaga.â€
Umuyobozi wâ€™ikigo Nishimwe Naomie yizeho yavuze ko bakimenya ko uyu mwana ari muri Miss Rwanda bakanguriye abanyeshuri kumushyigikira yaba mu buryo bwo kumutora ndetse nâ€™ubundi bwose bushoboka.
Isheja Ricky Junior uhagarariye abandi banyeshuri muri Glory Secondary School yabwiye IGIHE ko uyu mukobwa yari umuntu usetsa kandi uzi kubana nâ€™abantu ku buryo ari umwe mu bari bishimiwe cyane mu kigo.
Ati â€œNishimwe Naomie yari umukobwa ukunda gusetsa cyane, nimwiza cyane twamufataga nkâ€™uwa mbere mu burang. Nibyadutunguye kuba yabaye Miss Rwanda.â€
Umukundwa Keilla bucura bwo kwa Nishimwe Naomie na we wiga muri iki kigo mukuru we yanyuzemo, yabwiye IGIHE ko bishimiye cyane iyi ntsinzi.
Umukundwa wiga mu wa kane HEG (History-Economics -Geography) yavuze ko yaba mu rugo ndetse no ku ishuri bishimiye gutsinda kwa mukuru we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku ishuri yigagaho Nishimwe Naomie azwi nkâ€™umukobwa wâ€™uburanga ariko usetsa cyane ku buryo abanyeshuri hafi ya bose bari bamuzi.
Nishimwe Naomie si we wa mbere wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda avuye muri iki kigo cya Glory Secondary School cyane ko mu 2015 havuye na Kundwa Doriane.
Usibye aba bakobwa begukanye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda ariko iki kigo kibitse andi Makamba nkâ€™irya Lynca Akacu wabaye igisonga cya kabiri cya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda mu mwaka wa 2015.
Aha hize kandi Marie dâ€™Amour Uwase Rangira wabaye igisonga cya gatatu cya Miss Rwanda 2016, Ndahiro Liliane wabaye Miss Congeneniality 2018 na Gaju Anitha witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2019.

Title: Ikanzu ya Meghan, Shaddyboo, ikamba rishya: Udushya mu birori byo gutoranya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hatanzwe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryegukanywe na Nishimwe Naomie, iri ryabaye ijoro rirerire ku bitabiriye ibi birori ariko nanone ryaranzwe nâ€™ibintu byinshi bitandukanye.
Mu ijoro ryo kuwa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo hatanzwe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryegukanywe na Nishimwe Naomie, iri ryabaye ijoro rirerire ku bitabiriye ibi birori ariko nanone ryaranzwe nâ€™ibintu byinshi bitandukanye.
IGIHE yakusanyije tumwe mu dushya twagaragaye muri uyu muhango wabareye kuri Intare Arena i Rusororo mu karere ka Gasabo.
Ubwitabire bwâ€™abafana muri Miss Rwanda 2020
Ibirori byo gutanga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 byabereye kuri Intare Arena, nubwo atari hafi cyane yo mu mujyi rwagati ariko ntibyaciye intege abantu babyitabiriye kuko bari buzuye mu cyumba cyatangiwemo ikamba.
Imyanya yose yari irimo abantu kandi abafana mu mpande zose ariko bagaragaza umuriri wo gushyigikira abakobwa batandukanye bari bashyigikiye.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™umuco, Edouard Bamporiki yatashye adasoje ibirori
Ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020 byitabiriwe nâ€™abayobozi batandukanye barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™amahanga Olivier Nduhungirehe ndetse nâ€™Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri yâ€™Urubyiruko nâ€™Umuco Bamporiki Edouard.
Mu buryo butunguranye saa sita zâ€™ijoro zibura iminota mike Bamporiki Edouard yahagurutse asezera kubo bari bicaranye aritahira. Bamwe mu babonye uyu muyobozi agiye batekereje ko arambiwe nâ€™ibi birori byatinze kurangira cyane ko byashyizweho akadomo saa saba nâ€™igice zâ€™igicuku.
Impaka zikomeye mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka mbere yo gutangaza Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020
Nyuma yâ€™uko abakobwa icyenda bari bamaze gusezererwa, abakobwa 10 bari basigaye bakamurikira akanama nkemurampaka imishinga yabo abari bashinzwe kubaha amanota basabwe gufata akanya bakajya guteranya amanota bityo bagatangaza uwahize abanda ari na we wegukana ikamba.
Umwiherero wâ€™abagize akanama nkemurampaka watinze ku rwego rwo hejuru kuko barengeje isaha mu mpaka zikomeye.
Nyuma yo kugaruka bazanye amanota ateranyije nabwo impaka zari zose nubundi ubona batarumvikana ku manota batanze. Nyuma yâ€™izo mpaka hemejwe ko Nishimwe Naomie ari we wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ikanzu ya Nimwiza Meghan mu birori bya Miss Rwanda ni kimwe mu bitazava mu mitwe yâ€™abakurikiye iri rushanwa
Nimwiza Meghan wari usanganywe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2019 yari yitabiriye ibirori byo kuritanga, uyu mukobwa yaje yambaye ikanzu ndende kandi yagutse yatunguye benshi.
Usibye abatangajwe nâ€™iyi kanzu na nyirayo kuyigenderamo byamutonze cyane ko byamusabaga kugenda ayifashe cyangwa afite itsinda ryâ€™abamukikije bamufasha gutambuka itamuteze.
Kwicara yambaye iyi kanzu ni kimwe mu byagoye cyane uyu mukobwa umaranye umwaka ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2019.
Kutubahiriza igihe byatumye ibirori biba iminsi ibiri 
Byari byitezwe ko ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 ritangwa tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020, icyakora bitunguranye iri kamba ryatanzwe nyuma yâ€™amasaha hafi abiri ku wundi munsi.
Nta mpamvu nâ€™imwe yateye ubu bukerererwe yigeze itangazwa icyakora imwe mu zagaragariye buri wese witabiriye ibi birori ni ugutinda kwemeza uwegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 byafashe isaha irenga.
Amasura mashya mu bagize akanama nkemurampaka
Batanu bari bagize akanama nkemurampaka ni Munyaneza James umunyamakuru wa The New Times ubifitemo uburambe, Ntarindwa Diogene Atome umunyarwenya wâ€™icyamamare mu Rwanda, Umubyinnyi wâ€™ikirangirire ku Isi Sherri Silver, Evelyne Umurerwa umaze igihe ari umunyamakuru mu kigo cyâ€™igihugu cyâ€™itangazamakuru ndetse na Mutesi Jolly wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2016.
Muri aba tumaze kuvuga hejuru, Ntarindwa Diogene uzwi nka Atome ndetse na Sherri Silver yari amasura mashya mu kanama nkemurampaka ka Miss Rwanda.
Ibirori byitabiriwe na ba Nyampinga bo mu bindi bihugu
Ibi birori kandi byitabiriwe na ba nyampinga baturutse mu bindi bihugu baje kwihera ijisho umukobwa wegukana ikamba.
Muri bo harimo Dative Uwimana waserukiye u Burundi muri Miss Africa University mu 2019; Nyampinga wa Tanzania, Sylivia Sebastian, watowe mu mwaka wa 2019; Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana; Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi; Miss Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudani yâ€™Epfo na Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda.
Ni ubwa mbere abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu batwaye amakamba bitabira kuri urwo rwego.
Bwa mbere abakobwa bari bambaye amakanzu yadodewe mu Rwanda
Abakobwa bahatanaga mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda mu birori byo gutanga ikamba bari bambitswe nâ€™abanyamideri babiri aribo Tanga Design na Ian Boutique.
Eric Birasa uhagarariye Ian Boutique yabwiye IGIHE ko amakanzu abakobwa bose baserukanye ari imyambaro yadodewe mu Rwanda bikaba ari ubwa mbere bibaye mu gihe cyâ€™imyaka itandatu amaze akora iki gikorwa cyo kwambika abakobwa bo muri Miss Rwanda.
Urubyiniro rwari ruteguye neza cyane kimwe nâ€™icyumba cyabereyemo ibi birori
Buri wese winjiraga ahari hagiye kubera ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020 yatungurwaga nâ€™uburyo hari hatatse neza cyane, byagaragaraga ko ari ibirori byiteguwe ku rwego rwo hejuru.

Title: Incamake yâ€™urugendo rwa Nishimwe Naomie mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda rwamuhesheje kwambara ikamba
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 nyuma yâ€™urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo nâ€™ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Nishimwe Naomie yambitswe ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 nyuma yâ€™urugendo rukomeye yagiye anahuriramo nâ€™ibizazane ariko byose akabirenga kugeza yegukanye ikamba.
Uyu mukobwa mu kiganiro yahaye abanyamakuru nyuma yo gutorwa, yavuze ko hari igihe cyageze agacika intege ku buryo yumvaga nâ€™irushanwa nyirizina yaryihorera akivanamo.
Nishimwe Naomie wambitswe ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yaryinjiyemo yiyamamarije mu mujyi wa Kigali.
Akimara gutsindira guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, yahise atangira kwibasirwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ashinjwa kuba akorana bya hafi na MTN Rwanda bityo hakaba hari abagaragazaga impungenge zâ€™uko iyi sosiyete yeteye inkunga Miss Rwanda 2020 yazagira uruhare mu itsinda rye.
Ari abategura iri rushanwa cyangwa ubuyobozi bwa Miss Rwanda bose bavuze ko uyu mukobwa kwinjira mu irushanwa nta tegeko yishe ndetse arimo mu buryo bwubahirije amategeko.
Bose bahumurije abakurikirana iri rushanwa bababwira ko kuba uyu mukobwa hari uburyo yakoranye na MTN Rwanda ntacyo byamwongereraho.
Nyuma yo guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, Nishimwe Naomie mu ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze yaserukanye umushinga wo kurwanya indwara yâ€™agahinda gakabije (Depression).
Uyu mushinga waherekeje Nishimwe Naomie kugeza umuhesheje ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wâ€™umwaka wa 2020 yambitswe mu birori byabaye mu ijoro ryo kuri uyu wa Gatandatu tariki 22 Gashyantare 2020.
Usibye ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ikamba ryâ€™umukobwa uberwa nâ€™amafoto wahembwe na Bella Flowers yamugeneye 1 200 000frw.
Nishimwe Naomie yayoboye abandi bakobwa mu majwi kuva mu ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze kugeza ku munsi wa nyuma wâ€™irushanwa yarushaga abandi bakobwa amajwi yaba kuri Internet no mu buryo bwa SMS.
Ikamba rya Miss Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie yegukanye ryamuhesheje kwegukana ibihembo binyuranye. Nka Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 yagenewe imodoka nshya yo mu bwoko bwa Suzuki Swift 2019 yatanzwe na Suzuki binyuze muri Rwanda Motor ifite agaciro ka miliyoni 18 zâ€™amafaranga yâ€™u Rwanda.
Yemerewe kandi umushahara wâ€™ibihumbi 800 Frw ku kwezi mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka, aya akazatangwa na Africa Improved Foods.
Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda yemerewe kwivuza ku buntu ku ivuriro ryitwa Ubuzima Polyclinique no gusohokera muri Camellia agafata icyo ashaka mu gihe kingana nâ€™umwaka azamarana ikamba.
Yemerewe itike yâ€™indege izamujyana i Dubai nâ€™ibindi byose bijyanye nâ€™urugendo azakora mu rwego rwâ€™ikiruhuko, iyi ikazatangwa na kompanyi yitwa Multi Design Group.
Keza Salon yemeyeko izamukorera ibijyanye nâ€™imisatsi ndetse no kwita ku bwiza bwe mu gihe cyâ€™umwaka wose.
Yemerewe gucapirwa inyandiko zose ku buntu ku bintu byose azaba ashaka muri Smart Design, mu gihe True Connect yo yamwemereye internet yâ€™umwaka ku buntu.
Mu gihe agiye mu birori, uyu mukobwa azajya yambikwa na Ian Boutique ku buntu ahabwe nâ€™imyenda ya Siporo yâ€™ubuntu muri Magasin Sport Class.
Umukobwa wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda buri mwaka ahita anatsindira itike yo guhagararira igihugu muri Miss World.
Ishimwe Naomie wegukanye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ni umwana wâ€™imyaka 21 upima metero 1.70 akaba yari yambaye nimero 31 mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.

Abitabiriye ibi birori bashyiriweho imodoka zibakura kuri Stade Amahoro i Remera zibageza i Rusororo.
Mu masaha ya saa Kumi nâ€™imwe, abantu benshi bageze aho irushanwa ribera, baserutse bafite ibyapa biriho amazina yâ€™abakobwa bashyigikiye bifuza ko aribo bakwambikwa ikamba.
Urebye ku maso yabo bifitiye icyizere, bambariye gushyigikira abakobwa babo no kuza kubabona bashinjagirana isheja bambikwa ikamba.
Usibye ibyapa, bambaye imipira iriho amazina nâ€™amafoto yâ€™abo bashyigikiye. Bicaye ahantu hamwe ku buryo umuriri wabo ushobora gusakara ukagera kuri benshi mu bateraniye mu Intare Arena.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 ryatangiriye mu Karere ka Rubavu ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2019, ahatoranyirijwe abakobwa batandatu bemerewe guhagararira Intara yâ€™Uburengerazuba; ku wa 28 Ukuboza 2019 mu Karere ka Musanze hatoranyijwe abakobwa batandatu bahagarariye Amajyaruguru.
Umwaka wa 2020 watangiye irushanwa rikomereza mu Karere ka Huye aho ku wa 4 Mutarama havuye abakobwa barindwi bahagarariye Amajyepfo. Ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze mu ntara ryasorejwe mu Karere ka Kayonza, ahavuye abakobwa 15 bahagarariye Uburasirazuba mu gihe ku wa 18 Mutarama 2020, abakobwa 20 batoranyirijwe guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali.
Mu bakobwa 400 bose bageze ahabereye ijonjora ryâ€™ibanze, 54 gusa ni bo bemeje abagize akanama nkemurampaka bemererwa gukomeza mu cyiciro cya nyuma cyasize havuyemo 20 bagiye mu mwiherero wâ€™ibyumweru bibiri wabereye muri La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata.
Abakobwa 20 batangiye umwiherero ku wa 9 Gashyantare 2020, ariko Ingabire Jolie Ange ntiyagize amahirwe yo gukomeza kuko yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Irushanwa ryâ€™ubwiza mu Rwanda ryatangiye mu 1993 icyo gihe Nyampinga yabaye Miss Uwera Dalila, ryambitswe Bahati Grace mu 2009, mu 2012 rihabwa Kayibanda Mutesi Aurore, mu 2014 ryambikwa Akiwacu Colombe, Kundwa Doriane arihabwa mu 2015, Mutesi Jolly atorwa mu 2016, Iradukunda Elsa afata irya 2017, irya 2018 ryahawe Iradukunda Liliane mu gihe iriheruka mu 2019 ryatwawe na Nimwiza Meghan.

Title: Babou agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki nyuma yo kurangiza amashuri yisumbuye (Video)
Body:
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma yâ€™uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Shema Arnaud benshi bamenye nka Babou nyuma yâ€™uko arangije amasomo mu mashuri yisumbuye yahishuye ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki cyane ko yari yabaye abihagaritse kubera kwiga.
Mu myaka yatambutse abagiye bakurikiranira hafi ibya muzika bamenye uwari umwana witwa Babou wamenyekanye cyane mu njyana ya Hip Hop.
Mu 2017 uyu musore yaje kuburirwa irengero mu muziki we gusa we ahamya ko byatewe nâ€™uko yari ahugiye mu masomo.
Uyu musore warangije amasomo ye mu mwaka wa 2019 muri St Andre i Nyamirambo, aho yize imibare, ubugenge nâ€™ubumenyi bwâ€™Isi, akaba umwe mu bategereje amanota yavuye mu kizamini cya Leta yakoze.
Babou yatangiye umuziki afite imyaka umunani urukundo rwawo arukomoye kuri nyirarume Jerome Peterson wabarizwaga muri TFP Crew yari igizwe nâ€™abahanzi batandukanye.
Avuga uko yinjiye mu muziki yagize atiâ€ Nigeze kujya mu gitaramo cyarimo marume, ndeba uburyo baririmbye abantu bakishima dutashye mubwira ko mbishaka ansaba ko ngomba gutsinda neza mu mashuri abanza kugira ngo anyemerere kubijyamo. Mbaye uwa mbere icyo gihe nibwo yanyandikiye indirimbo aranayinkoreshereza.â€
Babou avuga ko icyo gihe yafashijwe cyane na nyirarume ndetse nâ€™itsinda ryâ€™abo bakoranaga muri TFP.
Uyu musore yavuze ko ubwo yari agiye mu mwaka wa kane wâ€™amashuri yisumbuye aribwo yahisemo kuba aretse ibyâ€™umuziki kugira ngo ahe umwanya amasomo ye.
Nyuma yo gusoza ibyo kwiga amashuri yisumbuye, Babou yabwiye IGIHE ko agiye gusubukura ibyâ€™umuziki ndetse mu gihe cya vuba azashyira hanze indirimbo ye nshya.
Kugeza ubu uyu musore aracyakorana bya hafi na nyirarume Peterson nâ€™ubundi wamwinjije mu muziki.
Babou avuga ko umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kugeza ubu uhagaze neza, wateye imbere ndetse harimo amahirwe menshi yaba mu buryo abahanzi binjiza amafaranga ndetse nâ€™ibikorwa remezo bituma abahanzi bakora neza mu buryo bworoshye.
Uyu muraperi wamenyekanye akiri umwana yashimiye buri wese wamubaye hafi akinjira mu muziki yaba abahanzi, abanyamakuru ndetse nâ€™abakunzi bâ€™umuziki bamuhaye icyizere cyabo, anabasaba kuzongera kumwakirana yombi mu gihe azaba agarutse.
Babou yamenyekanye cyane mu bwana bwe aho yafatwaga nkâ€™umuraperi ukiri muto, aha akaba yari afite indirimbo zinyuranye zirimo iyitwa; Rimwe kabiri, Do it, Njye na Muzika yakoranye na Tuff Gang nâ€™izindi nyinshi yaririmbye zirimo Arambona agaseka yaririmbye.

Title: Nyampinga wa Botswana, Sudani yâ€™Epfo na Ghana bitabiriye ibirori bya Miss Rwanda 2020
Body:
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan yâ€™Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Oweditse Phirinyane wo muri Botswana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wo muri Ghana uyu wazanye nâ€™igisonga cye cya kabiri Princess Owusua Gyamfi na Mariah Nyayeina wo muri Sudan yâ€™Amajyepfo baraye i Kigali bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Usibye Oweditse Phirinyane Nyampinga wa Botswana yageze i Kigali ku mugoroba wo ku wa Kane tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020, aba bakobwa bandi bageze i Kigali mu bihe bitandukanye byo kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 aho bitabiriye umuhango wo gutanga ikamba muri Miss Rwanda 2020.
Ku mugoroba wâ€™uyu munsi nibwo Mariah Nyayeina, Nyampinga wa Sudani yâ€™Epfo na we yageze mu Rwanda.
Uwanyuma wageze mu Rwanda ni Nyampinga wa Ghana, Rebecca Nana Adwoa Kwabi wabaye uwa gatanu witabiriye Miss Rwanda 2020.
Aba bose bahasanze Oliver Nakakande wo muri Uganda ndetse na Sylivia Sebastian wo muri Tanzania bahageze mbere yâ€™abandi.
Miss Rwanda 2020 niyo ya mbere yitabiriwe nâ€™abakobwa bo mu bindi bihugu.
Irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo, abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere yâ€™iminsi mike ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba. Ubu basigaye ari 19, nyuma yâ€™uko Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Amatike yo kwinjira mu birori bizatangarizwamo Miss Rwanda 2020 yamaze gushyirwa ku isoko, abayashaka bashobora kuyagura bifashishije Mobile Money (*182*8*1*333111#), Ecobank cyangwa bakayasanga kuri Camellia muri KBC, Keza Saloon no kuri Smart Design.

Nyuma yâ€™iminsi avuye mu irushanwa abakobwa bahataniraga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda babwiye IGIHE ko bababajwe nâ€™uyu mugenzi wabo utarabashije gukomeza guhatana kubera impamvu zâ€™uburwayi.
Benshi muri aba bakobwa bahishuye ko ryari ijoro ribi cyane igihe basezeraga kuri Ingabire. Bahamya ko bababajwe nuko ibyamubayeho ari impamvu zatunguranye kandi nta yandi mahitamo bari bafite.
Ikindi aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bahurizaho ni uburyo Ingabire yababaniye neza mu mwiherero ku buryo kuvamo kwe byabaye agahinda gakomeye.
Kirezi Rutaremara Brune umwe mu bahatanira ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020 yagize ati â€Jolie Ange sinzi uko namuvuga; aritonda, mu bantu nabonaga bashoboraga gutwara nâ€™ikamba na we yari arimo. Kumva ko avuye mu irushanwa atari iyindi mpamvu ari uburwayi, njye ku giti cyanjye byarambabaje.â€
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko bose byabababaje cyane ku buryo iyo baganira muri rusange basanga iyaba hari ikindi cyashobokaga bari kugikora ariko byarenze ubushobozi bwabo.
Teta Ndenga Nicole wiganye na Ingabire mu mashuri yisumbuye we yavuze ko yababajwe bikomeye nuko uyu mukobwa wâ€™inshuti ye yavuye mu irushanwa.
Akaliza Hope yavuze ko Ingabire ari umukobwa wakundaga kubatera imbaraga kenshi kabone nâ€™iyo babaga bari gukora ibintu bigoye akababwira ko we yumva ntacyo bimutwaye.
Aba bakobwa bose bababajwe no kuva mu irushanwa kwa mugenzi wabo bamusabira gukira akamera neza ariko kandi akanihanganira ibyabaye bamwibutsa ko atari ryo herezo ryâ€™ubuzima.
Ingabire Jolie Ange yasezeye mu irushanwa nyuma yuko yari yaryinjiyemo atsindiye guhagararira Intara yâ€™Amajyepfo.
Itike yakuye mu Ntara yâ€™Amajyepfo niyo yamwinjije muri Pre-Selection, aha naho yahanyuranye umucyo bituma yinjira muri 20 berekeje mu mwiherero.
Uyu mukobwa yasezeye muri Miss Rwanda nyuma yâ€™icyumweru yari amaze mu mwiherero uri kubera La Palisse Hotel i Nyamata. Kuri ubu abakobwa basigaye bahatanira ikamba bakaba ari 19.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.

Amasezerano ahuriweho nâ€™impande zombi nta gihe cyashyizweho agomba kurangiriraho, ahubwo naba atagitanga inyungu zihuriweho azashyirwaho iherezo.

Title: Miss Rwanda 2020: Ibyo abakobwa bazakumbura mu mwiherero nâ€™umushinga wa buri wese (Video)
Body:

Abakobwa 19 bari kurangiza umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda 2020 mu gihe bitegura umunsi wa nyuma wâ€™irushanwa uzatanga Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda wa 2020.
Aba bakobwa babaye 19 nyuma yâ€™uko mugenzi wabo Ingabire Jolie Ange atabashije gukomeza cyane ko yasezeye kubera uburwayi bwamutunguye bugatuma atabasha gukomeza irushanwa.
Aba bakobwa uko ari 19 bose twabasuye mu mwiherero tuganira ku bintu binyuranye birimo uko bari babayeho mu mwiherero, ibyo bazawukumburamo nâ€™incamake ku mishinga yabo.
Mu biganiro nâ€™aba bakobwa bose bahuriza ku kuba bazakumbura umwiherero wa Miss Rwanda kuko bari babanye neza, babayeho nkâ€™umuryango.
Akaliza Hope yagize ati â€œNzakumbura abakobwa tubana muri rusange, uko twasangiraga, uko twagendanaga mbega ni byinshi.â€
Musana Teta Hense nawe uri mu bahatana muri Miss Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko azakumbura bagenzi be, ibiganiro bahabwaga nâ€™ibindi.
Ati â€œNzakumbura aba bakobwa twabanye, buri wese afite umwihariko we. Nzakumbura ibiganiro byari byiza. Kubona amahirwe yo kubona abayobozi batuganiriza nzabikumbura.â€
Nishimwe Naomie na we yagize ati â€œIkintu nzakumbura ni ugusangira nijoro nâ€™abandi bakobwa ubundi tukaza kumva gahunda zâ€™undi munsi turi kuririmba nzabikumbura cyane.â€
Imishinga yabo
Ikirezi Rutaremara Brune yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gufasha abanyarwanda bafite ubumuga bwo mu mutwe. Ingabire Rehma we afite umushinga wo guteza imbere imibereho ya mwarimu.
Teta Ndenga Nicole yavuze ko afite umushinga wo gukangurira abanyarwanda nâ€™urubyiruko guhinga ibiti byâ€™imbuto. Akaliza Hope we yavuze ko umushinga we ushingiye ku gukangurira abana bâ€™abakobwa kwitabira kwiga ubukerarugendo.
Mutesi Denise afite umushinga wo kugabanya umubare wâ€™abantu badafite akazi mu gihugu cyâ€™u Rwanda. Umutesi Denise umushinga we ni uguteza imbere uburenganzira bwâ€™abaguzi.
Mutegwantebe Chanice afite umushinga wo guhuriza hamwe abantu batishoboye basabiriza ku mihanda mu rwego rwo kubafasha kwiteza imbere.
Nishimwe Naomie afite umushinga wo kurwanya ubwigunge mu rubyiruko. Musana Teta Hense we umushinga we ni ukurwanya kanseri mu Rwanda.
Umuratwa Anitha umushinga we ni ugufasha abana kubyaza impano zabo umusaruro cyane cyane siporo. Marebe Benitha umushinga afite umushinga wo kubaka ubushobozi bwâ€™urubyiruko rufite ubumuga.
Irasubiza Alliance umushinga we ni ukurwanya inda zâ€™imburagihe mu bana bakiri bato bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 18.
Ingabire Diane afite umushinga wo kurwanya ibiyobyabwenge cyane cyane mu rubyiruko. Uwase Aisha we afite umushinga wo gukangurira abahuye nâ€™ihohoterwa kutariceceka.
Mukangwije Rosine afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiruko kwiteza imbere binyuze mu kwikorera.
Nyinawumuntu Delice we afite umushinga wo gushishikariza abana bâ€™abakobwa kwiga siyansi nâ€™ikoranabuhanga. Ingabire Gaudance afite umushinga wo gushishikariza urubyiriko kwitabira ubukerarugendo bwâ€™imbere mu gihugu mu gihe Umwiza Phionah afite umusinga wo kurwanya ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 18.
Kamikazi Rurangirwa Nadege we afite umushinga wo kwita kubana bafite indwara izwi nka â€œDown Syndromeâ€ no guhugura imiryango yabo uburyo babitaho. Ni indwara ifata umwana ukiri mu nda ya nyina. Ishobora gutuma umwana avuka hari uduce twâ€™umubiri tumwe na tumwe abuze cyangwa se mu mutwe he hadakora nkâ€™ibisanzwe.
Kugeza ubu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 riri kugana ku musozo abakobwa bahatanira ikamba bari mu mwiherero mbere yâ€™amasaha make ngo hamenyekane uzegukana ikamba.
Aba bakobwa bari mu mwiherero bamaze kuvamo umwe cyane ko ubu basigaye ari 19 nyuma yâ€™uko Ingabire Jolie Ange asezeye mu irushanwa kubera uburwayi.
Umukobwa uzambikwa ikamba rya Nyampinga wâ€™u Rwanda 2020 uzasimbura Nimwiza Meghan ufite irya 2019, azamenyekana mu birori biteganyijwe kubera muri Intare Conference Arena i Rusororo mu ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare 2020.

Title: Abakobwa batabashije gukomeza muri Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomereje ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo mu Karere ka Gisagara
Body:
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ryâ€™irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Nyuma yo kwiyemeza kwihuriza hamwe bagakora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo, abakobwa 34 batabashije kurenga ijonjora rya nyuma (Pre-Selection) ryâ€™irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bakomeje gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bari barateguye.
Abo bakobwa bibumbiye mu itsinda â€œWe for the Nationâ€ kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Gashyantare 2020 bakomereje ibyo bikorwa mu Karere ka Gisagara aho baganirije urubyiruko rwâ€™abanyeshuri ku gukumira gusambanya abana ndetse no kurwanya inda zâ€™imburagihe ziterwa abangavu.
Ni nyuma yâ€™uko ku wa 13 Gashyantare 2020 basuye ikigo kirererwamo abana bafite ubumuga cya HVP Gatagara i Gikondo ho mu mujyi wa Kigali; aho baganiriye nâ€™ubuyobozi bwabasobanuriye ibikorwa bihakorerwa buri munsi ndetse banagira umwanya wo kwifatanya nâ€™abana baharererwa yaba mu gusangira ndetse no kwidagadurana.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye iryo tsinda yavuze ko bahisemo kuganiriza urubyiruko ku ngingo yo gusambanya abana no gukumira inda ziterwa abangavu kuko ari ikibazo gihangayikishije muri iki gihe.
Ati â€œBuri mukobwa muri twe yari afite umushinga we; uyu wo gukumira inda zitateganyijwe ni imwe muri iyo mishinga. Gusa ikibazo cyâ€™abana basabanywa ndetse nâ€™icyâ€™abangavu baterwa inda kirahangayikishije ni yo mpamvu twiyemeje gutanga umusanzu mu kuzikumira tuganiriza urubyiruko.â€
Kuri ubu itsinda â€œWe for the Nationâ€ rigizwe nâ€™abakobwa 34 ariko abaje kuganiriza urubyiruko mu Karere ka Gisagara ni 10 kuko bagenzi babo bari mu bindi bikorwa birimo kwiga nâ€™ibindi.
Mu Karere ka Gisagara baganirije urubyiruko rwâ€™abanyeshuri biga kuri GS Saint Philippe Neri hamwe nâ€™abiga kuri Saint Eugenie Smet aho bari bahuriye ku kibuga cyâ€™umupira wâ€™amaguru kuko ayo mashuri yombi yari yakinnye.
Igihozo Dianne watanze ikiganiro yagarutse ku ngaruka zo gusambanya abana no gutwara inda imburagihe, asaba urubyiruko kwirinda ibishuko bishobora kubashora mu busambanyi.
Yagize ati â€œCyane cyane nkamwe bâ€™abanyeshuri na twe twese akenshi hari igihe badushukishaga amandazi, bombo, amafaranga nâ€™ibindi. Icya mbere ni uko abana bâ€™abakobwa tugomba kumenya ko dufite agaciro tukirinda abadushuka.â€
Yabibukije ko umukobwa usambanyijwe agaterwa inda bimugiraho ingaruka mbi zitandukanye bikamwicira ejo hazaza.
Ati â€œMuri mwe harimo abazaba Abadepite; Abaminisitiri cyangwa mukazayobora mu bundi buryo. Mureke twirinde ibishuko bitwicira ejo hazaza.â€
Nyuma yâ€™ibiganiro byatanzwe urubyiruko rwahawe umwanya wo kubaza ibibazo bitandukanye byibanze ku buzima bwâ€™imyororokere.
Umukozi ushinzwe uburinganire nâ€™iterambere ryâ€™umuryango mu Karere ka Gisagara, Sewabo Vincent, ni we wabakiriye ashima ibikorwa byabo abizeza ubufatanye.
Ati â€œNi byiza kuko biraza gutuma hari icyo twunguka mu kugabanya imibare yâ€™abana bakomeje gusabanywa mu karere.â€
Sewabo yavuze ko mu mezi 11 ashize mu Karere ka Gisagara hagaragaye abangavu bagera kuri 214 bari munsi yâ€™imyaka 17 batewe inda imburagihe.
Urubyiruko rwagiriwe inama yo kudahishira abasore nâ€™abagabo basambanya abangavu kuko babicira ubuzima bityo bakwiye guhanwa byâ€™intangarugero kugira ngo abandi babonereho hatazagira utekereza kongera guhirahira asambanya umwangavu.
Gaju Evelyne uhagarariye â€œWe for the Nationâ€ yavuze ko bishimiye uko igikorwa bateguye mu Karere ka Gisagara cyagenze bityo byabongereye imbaraga zo gukomeza ibyo biyemeje.
Yavuze ko bashinze uwo muryango bagamije gukora ibikorwa byâ€™urukundo nkâ€™uko bari babyiyemeje ubwo bitabiraga irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 bityo biteguye no kwakira umufatanyabikorwa wese waza kubashyigikira.

Title: Niyo Bosco yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€
Body:
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi bâ€™umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ ikurikira â€œUbigenza ute?â€ uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Niyo Bosco umaze kubaka izina mu mitima ya benshi mu bakunzi bâ€™umuziki wâ€™u Rwanda kuri ubu yasohoye indirimbo ye nshya yise â€œIbangaâ€ ikurikira â€œUbigenza ute?â€ uyu musore yaherukaga gushyira hanze.
Indirimbo â€œIbangaâ€ ya Niyo Bosco ikubiyemo ubutumwa bukangurira abantu kugira ibanga, agaragazamo ingaruka zikunze kuba ku bantu batarigira.
Mu nyikirizo yâ€™iyi ndirimbo uyu muhanzi agira ati â€Ibanga ni igihamya cyemeza ko uri umwizerwa, kugira ibanga nibyo bishimangira ubupfura bwawe. Uko waba uri kose utagira ibanga amagambo uvugwa niyo menshi kurusha ayo avuga! Jya uvuga uziga [â€¦].â€
Uyu muhanzi yakanguriye abantu kuvuga baziga, bakavuga ibyo babajijwe cyane ko nâ€™umunyarwanda yaciye umugani ko akarimi kabi gasemera agasaya.
Niyokwizerwa Bosco wamenyekanye nka Niyo Bosco ni umusore wâ€™imyaka 20 yâ€™amavuko ukora umuziki ariko afite ubumuga bwo kutabona.
Mu kiganiro aherutse kugirana na IGIHE, Niyo Bosco yasabye abantu kutumva ko yaba akunzwe kubera impuhwe agirirwa ku bwâ€™ikibazo afite ahubwo bakita ku mpano ye mu muziki.
Uyu wahereye cyera aririmba ariko atarabona ubushobozi, yaje kurabukwa nâ€™umunyamakuru Irene Mulindahabi wamufashije kumenyekanisha impano ye mu 2019.
Nyuma yuko Isi yose ibonye impano iri muri uyu musore, abantu banyuranye biyemeje kumufasha, kuri ubu Niyo Bosco afite ikipe imufasha mu bijyanye na muzika ndetse no mu buzima bwa buri munsi.
Iyi ndirimbo ye nshya mu buryo wâ€™amajwi yakorewe muri Uno Record ikorwa na Producer witwa Santana mu gihe amashusho yayo yafashwe akanatunganywa na Bagenzi Bernard uri mu bagezweho muri iyi minsi.

Title: Ubwoba, kimwe mu bitiza umurindi coronavirus
Body:
Muri iyi minsi, isi yose ihangayikishijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya coronavirus kigenda gikwirakwira hose ari nako gihitana benshi. Mu byâ€™ukuri abantu benshi ntibabasha kumva umuvuduko iki cyorezo kigenderaho ndetse nâ€™ingaruka kigira kubatuye isi bose.
Muri iyi minsi, isi yose ihangayikishijwe nâ€™icyorezo cya coronavirus kigenda gikwirakwira hose ari nako gihitana benshi. Mu byâ€™ukuri abantu benshi ntibabasha kumva umuvuduko iki cyorezo kigenderaho ndetse nâ€™ingaruka kigira kubatuye isi bose.
Inkuru zijyanye nâ€™icyo cyorezo ziracicikana hose hifashishijwe uburyo butandukanye, harimo insakazamajwi, insakazamashusho, ibinyamakuru byanditse ndetse nâ€™imbuga nkoranyambaga zitandukanye aho amafoto yâ€™amasanduku arimo abapfuye, imibare yiyongera yâ€™abandura nâ€™abahitanwa nâ€™icyo cyorezo, inkuru zisanisha icyorezo nâ€™ubuhanuzi butandukanye, nâ€™ibindi. Hejuru yâ€™ibyo abantu basoma, hari nâ€™ibyo babasha kwibonera nâ€™amaso yabo.
Umuntu, ni ikiremwa kitifuza kuba cyonyine. Kimwe mu bishimisha umuntu ni ukuba ari hafi yâ€™abandi, atekanye, yumva yizeye abo bari kumwe, yitaweho kandi yita ku bandi ndetse afite agaciro mu bandi. Imwe mu ngaruka zikomeye abantu bahura nazo uyu munsi, ni ukubura ituze ryâ€™umutima bitewe nâ€™ubwoba bwâ€™ibyo batazi bishobora kuba ku buzima bwabo. Ibi bituma abantu bumva bahangayitse cyane.
Ni kenshi iyo abantu baganira ku bibahangayikishije birimo nâ€™ibyorezo bitandukanye nka coronavirus, bagira bati â€œUbwoba bwanyisheâ€. Uyu munsi, turabara umubare wâ€™abari kwicwa nâ€™icyorezo cyugarije isi, ariko ntabwo tubasha kubara umubare wâ€™abari kwicwa nâ€™ubwoba. Ubwoba ni umwicanyi mubi cyane ndetse wica benshi kurusha ibindi byose.
Abahanga bagaragaza ko ubwoba buca intege umubiri, bugatuma utabasha guhangana neza nâ€™ingaruka zâ€™ibiwugarije. Ibyo bivuze ko ubudahangarwa bwâ€™umubiri bugabanuka, bityo umubiri ukaba watsindwa kuburyo bworoshye. Ibyo bivuze kandi ko ubwoba ari kimwe mu bishobora gukwirakwiza icyorezo cya coronavirus nkâ€™uko kudakaraba, kuramukanya, kudasiga intera ihagije hagati yâ€™abantu, gukorora no kwitsamurira mu bandi, bigikwirakwiza.
 Icyorezo kikimara kugaragara mu Rwanda, Nyakubahwa Perezida wa Repuburika yâ€™u Rwanda Paul Kagame yasabye abantu kutagira ubwoba, kuko aribyo bizatuma dutsinda. Ibyo kandi byagaragaye mu mvugo zitandukanye zâ€™abayobozi.
Kwirinda kugira no gukwirakwiza ubwoba ni imwe mu ngamba zadufasha guhangana nâ€™icyorezo cya coronavirus ndetse nâ€™ingaruka zacyo. Ibyo kandi byadufasha gusigasira ubuzima bwacu dore ko ubwoba kimwe nâ€™andi marangamutima akabije byangiza imitekerereze yâ€™abantu nâ€™imikorere yâ€™umubiri.
Abahanga bagaragaza ko iyo amarangamutima ari hejuru, gutekereza biragabanuka cyane, bityo kwitekerezaho, gutekereza ku bacu nâ€™igihugu cyacu bikahazaharira. Ubwoba rero butuma tutabasha no gutekereza ku cyo twakora ngo twivane mu bibazo, aho bamwe bibarenga bikagera aho babona ko ubuzima nta gaciro bufite. Akenshi ibyo bishobora kuganisha kukwiyambura ubuzima, nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyo gutsindwa urugamba rwâ€™ubuzima.
Ubwoba ntibugira ingaruka ku mitekerereze gusa, ahubwo ingaruka zigera no ku mubiri wose. Bigira ingaruka ku mikorere yâ€™umutima wâ€™umuntu ushobora gutera cyane ndetse ukaba wananirwa, bishobora kugira ingaruka zitandukanye byâ€™umwihariko ku basanzwe bafite ikibazo cyâ€™umutima nâ€™izindi ndwara zifite aho zihurira nawo. Umuntu ashobora kandi guhumeka nabi, ibi byatiza umurindi kuremba kâ€™uwanduye-, igifu gishobora gukora nabi, imitsi yâ€™umubiri icika intege, umuntu ashobora kubura ubushake bwo kurya no gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, nâ€™ibindi.
Ingaruka rero ni nyinshi cyane, ariko kugira ubwoba ni ibintu bisanzwe, ni na kimwe mu biranga ko umuntu ari muzima. Ikibazo si ukugira ubwoba, ikibazo ni icyo tubukoraho, uko twitwara mu gihe tugize ubwoba, cyangwa uko busenya imbaraga nâ€™igisobanuro cyâ€™ubuzima kuri twe. Muri rusange, iyo hatagize igikorwa, ingaruka zikomoka ku bwoba ziba nyinshi cyane, ubwazo zikaba zaganisha ku rupfu.
Mu nkuru ikurikiyeho, tuzaganira kucyo twakora kugira ngo dutsinde ingaruka zâ€™ubwoba buturuka kuri coronavirus, bityo dukomeze dusigasire ubuzima bwacu, ubwâ€™imiryango ndetse nâ€™igihugu cyacu.
Diogene Karangwa

Title: Hari ahakwiye za Rond-point mu mihanda yâ€™i Kigali
Body:
Isangano ryâ€™imihanda [Rond-point] ni bumwe mu buryo bwiza ndetse buhiga ubundi bwose mu koroshya no kunoza inyuranamo ryâ€™ibinyabiziga mu mahuriro yâ€™imihanda (Muribuka umubyigano wâ€™imodoka wabaga Remera-Kisimenti nâ€™aho bita mu Kanogo, mbere yâ€™uko hashyirwa za Rond-point).
Isangano ryâ€™imihanda [Rond-point] ni bumwe mu buryo bwiza ndetse buhiga ubundi bwose mu koroshya no kunoza inyuranamo ryâ€™ibinyabiziga mu mahuriro yâ€™imihanda (Muribuka umubyigano wâ€™imodoka wabaga Remera-Kisimenti nâ€™aho bita mu Kanogo, mbere yâ€™uko hashyirwa za Rond-point).
Mu gihe abatwara ibinyabiziga bagorwa cyane no gucunga ibiturutse mu mpande zose mu mahuriro yâ€™imihanda (iburyo, ibumoso, imbere) cyangwa batanguranwa gutambuka mbere banga ko Feu-rouge zibafata (bikaba byaba intandaro yâ€™impanuka), Rond-Point zo zikoze ku buryo imihanda iyinjiramo iba nkâ€™ihese bigatuma urujya nâ€™uruza (circulation) rwerekeza mu cyerekezo kimwe, bityo, utwaye ikinyabiziga agacungana gusa nâ€™ibindi binyabiziga bituruka mu ruhande rumwe rwâ€™ibumoso (kubatwarira ibumoso nko mu Rwanda) cyangwa urwâ€™iburyo (kubatwarira iburyo nko mu Bwongereza).
Uko korohereza abashoferi bituma nta mpanuka nyinshi zibera muri Rond-point kandi bikihutisha urujya nâ€™uruza kuko ibinyabiziga bidasabwa guhagarara.
Nubwo muri Kigali tumenyereye Rond-point zâ€™uruziga, si ngombwa ko rond-point igomba kuba ari uruziga rugororotse, icyangombwa ni uko ibinyabiziga bishobora kuhakatira mu buryo bworoshye.
Nkâ€™uko tubikesha urubuga rwâ€™iIkigo gishinzwe Ubwikorezi i Washington, mu kugena ahajya Rond-point, ibyâ€™ingenzi byitabwaho ni umwanya wâ€™aho yakubakwa nâ€™umubyigano wâ€™ibinyabiziga bihaca.
Ibyo Rond-point zirusha ubundi buryo
Mu bushakashatsi bwakorewe muri Amerika nâ€™ikigo gishinzwe imihanda minini gifatanyije nâ€™ikindi gishinzwe ubwishingizi nâ€™umutekano wo ku mihanda minini (Federal Highway Administration- FHWA & Insurance Institute for Highway Safety -HIS), bwagaragaje ko rond-point zifite ubushobozi bwo kugabanya impanuka ho 90% kurusha ubundi buryo bwose burimo na Feu-Rouge.
Rond-point zigabanya:
Â 90% byâ€™impanuka zihitana ubuzima bwâ€™abantu
Â 75% byo gukomerekera mu muhanda
Â 40% byâ€™abanyamaguru bagongwa nâ€™imodoka
Â 37% byâ€™impanuka zose
Impamvu zituma rond-point zitanga umusaruro kuri urwo rwego ni uko zituma ibinyabiziga bigenda buhoro bigatuma nta mpanuka zikunze kuhabera nâ€™ibaye ikaba yoroheje.
Ituma kandi ibinyabiziga bidasiganwa nâ€™amatara atukura (bikunze kuba muri Feu-Rouge bikanaba intandaro yâ€™impanuka).
Ikindi kandi Rond-Point zikoze ku buryo ibinyabiziga bihana umwanya bitagombye ko hari bimwe bihagarara.
Ibinyabiziga bigenda umujyo umwe. Imihanda yinjira muri rond-point, ikoze ku buryo abakoresha umuhanda baba basa nâ€™aberekeza mu nzira imwe bigatuma utwaye ikinyabiziga yoroherwa kuko aba acungana nâ€™ibinyabiziga biri mu ruhande rumwe gusa.
Hari kandi ukwihutisha ibinyabiziga no kugabanya umubyigano (Traffic Jam). Uretse kubungabunga umutekano wo mu muhanda, Rond-point zifite ubushobozi bwo guhangana nâ€™umubyigano wâ€™imodoka.
Bitandukanye na Feu-Rouge, muri rond-point ntabwo ikinyabiziga gisabwa gutegereza ko itara ryâ€™icyatsi kibisi ryaka, ahubwo ibinyabiziga bigabanya umuvuduko bigakomeza bikagenda.
Inyigo zakozwe muri Amerika zipima uko ibinyabiziga bigenda ahari Feu-Rouge nâ€™ahari Rond-point, zerekanye ko Rond-point zihutisha ibinyabiziga ho 89% kurusha Feu-Rouge ndetse zikagabanya uguhagarara kwâ€™ibinyabiziga ho 56%. (Washington State Department of Transportation, 2020).
Rond-point zirahendutse ugereranyije na Feu-Rouge
Ugereranyije ibigenda kuri Feu-Rouge nkâ€™umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi, kuzitaho (maintenance), kuzisana (bazigonze) no kudakora icyo zigomba gukora mu gihe umuriro wâ€™amashanyarazi wagiye, Rond-point zo nta kijya kizibuza gukora akazi kazo.
Mu mihanda iri kwagurwa nâ€™indi mishya muri Kigali, hari amahuriro ubona yagakwiye kujyamo Rond-Point, ugereranyije umwanya uhari (space) nâ€™ubucucike bwâ€™ibinyabiziga bihaca.
Igereranya ryâ€™ahashobora kujya Rond-point nâ€™izindi Rond-point (hakoreshejwe Google maps)
Iki ni igitekerezo cyâ€™umwanditsi, mbiseguyeho mu gihe hagira uwo gikomeretsa. Mu gupima hifashishijwe google maps
Nshimiyimana Jean Pierre
Umwanditsi

Title: Hari ababuze uko biyogoshesha kubera coronavirus
Kurwanya COVID-19 si ibyâ€™Ubuhanuzi: Gukurikiza amabwiriza ya Leta ni cyo gisubizo
Body:
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga byâ€™umwihariko WhatsApp, mperutse kubona umuntu wanditse asaba imbabazi uwo ariwe wese yifurije kuzagira umwaka mwiza wa 2020. Impamvu yatanze ni ukubera guhagarika umutima byazanye nâ€™icyorezo cyadutse cya COVID-19 kije muri uyu mwaka kikaba gihangayikishije Isi yose.
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga byâ€™umwihariko WhatsApp, mperutse kubona umuntu wanditse asaba imbabazi uwo ariwe wese yifurije kuzagira umwaka mwiza wa 2020. Impamvu yatanze ni ukubera guhagarika umutima byazanye nâ€™icyorezo cyadutse cya COVID-19 kije muri uyu mwaka kikaba gihangayikishije Isi yose.
Uwabyanditse simuzi, cyakora kuba ahangayitse kubera gutegekwa kuguma mu rugo ku mpamvu zo kwikingira kwa twese birumvikana. Nahumure ibyorezo ntibizanwa nâ€™umwaka.
Hari nâ€™abagurishije utwabo mu 1999 barabeshywe nâ€™abemera ibyâ€™umunsi wâ€™imperuka ko nta we uwa 2000 uzasiga. Hari nâ€™abari baraciye igikuba ngo za mudasobwa zizajijwa kubera icyo bise Y2K. Na nâ€™ubu akazi karakomeje!
Abatabyibuka bazabaze ibyâ€™Umupadiri wâ€™Umugande witwa Joseph Kibwetere wicishije abantu bagera ku 1000 barimo abarenga 300 biyahuriye hamwe ahitwa Kanungu ku wa 17 Werurwe 2000. Abiyishe nâ€™ubayoboye bari mu cyo bise Muvoma yo kubungabunga Amategeko Cumi yâ€™Imana (Movement for the Restoration of the Ten Commandments of God).
Nâ€™uwagendera ku byago nâ€™amagorwa yâ€™abantu, nta Munyarwanda wakangwa no kuguma mu rugo atanatotezwa azi ibyabaye mu mwaka wa 1994. Ibi ni ibizavugwa bihagije mu byumweru bike bitaha.
Reka ngaruke kuri Coronavirus. Iki cyorezo cyatangiye kumenyekana aho cyagaragaye bwa mbere mu Bushinwa, mu mpera zâ€™umwaka 2019 no mu ntangiriro zâ€™uyu. Ni mu Mujyi wa Wuhan batangiye gukingirana abantu mu nzu babuza abandi kugenda, ariko nâ€™abandi bahunga icyo gihugu.
Ku itariki ya 11 Werurwe 2020, Ishami ryâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye ryita ku Buzima (OMS/WHO) ryemeje ku mugaragaro ko COVID-19 ari icyorezo cyugarije Isi. Mu gihe Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus uyobora OMS abitangaza ko COVID-19 ari icyorezo cyâ€™Isi, abantu bari bamaze kwandura bari 200,000 abo kimaze guhitana ari 8,000.
Icyo gihe u Rwanda rwari rwaratangiye gufata ingamba zo kugikumira no kugihashya mu gihe kihageze, ariko rutaramenya ko hari uwanduye iyo ndwara. Uwayanduye wa mbere mu gihugu yamenyekanye ku wa 14 Werurwe. Nyuma yâ€™iminsi ibiri abari banduye bamenyekanye bari bamaze kuba batanu. Hashize iminsi itatu abanduye bazwi bikubye inshuro zirenga ebyiri baba cumi nâ€™umwe.
Ibimenyetso byâ€™uko ibintu byakomeye atari aho kujenjeka byari byaragaragaye. Uretse abantu kureka amateraniro arimo nâ€™aho abantu basengera no gufungwa kwâ€™amashuri, ku wa 18 Werurwe hafashwe ingamba zirenze kwirinda kuramukanya no gukaraba, akanozasuku kâ€™ibiganza nâ€™intoki nâ€™ibindi.
Itangazo rya Minisiteri yâ€™Ubuzima ryahagaritse â€œingendo zâ€™indege ziva cyangwa zijya mu Rwanda, harimo na RwandAir, zinyuze ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cya Kigali uhereye tariki ya 20 Werurwe 2020 saa sita zâ€™ijoro. Ibyo bikamara igihe cyâ€™iminsi 30 ishobora kongerwa. Indege zâ€™ubwikorezi nâ€™ubutabazi zemerewe gukomeza gukora uko bisanzwe.
Bukeye nibwo hasohotse itangazo rya Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe ririmo ingamba icumi zijyanye nâ€™ubukana bwa Coronavirus. Harimo gusaba abaturarwanda kuguma mu ngo, guhagarika ingendo zimwe na zimwe, za moto kureka gutwara abagenzi nâ€™izindi. Izo ngamba zikaba zizamara ibyumweru bibiri, ni ukuvuga ko iminsi itiyongereye, uretse ko kwiyongera ari byo byashoboka, byarangira ku wa 3 Mata.
Mu bihe nkâ€™ibi abatari bake barahungabana bakishyira mu maboko yâ€™imbaraga zitagaragara, kuko bibaha amahoro. Ku wa 15 Werurwe uyu mwaka, nyuma yâ€™aho OMS yemereje ubukana bwâ€™iki cyorezo, insengero nyinshi zâ€™abakirisitu muri Kenya zaruzuye, abayoboke baje kwishinganisha ku yo bemera ko yabaremye ngo ibarinde â€œidayimoniâ€ Coronavirus.
Nta wabuza umuntu kwemera ibyo yemera, ariko hagati yo gusenga no gukurikiza amabwiriza ya Leta ashingira ku bushakashatsi bukorwa nâ€™abahanga muri siyansi, hari kimwe kiri munsi yâ€™ikindi. Gusengera virusi nkâ€™idayimoni, ni amashyengo akabije.
Amasengesho abaye ari igisubizo, iyi ndwara ntiyakwica abihayimana. Kuba Papa i Roma yemera agahagarika amasengesho yo mu Kiliziya, ni uko yemera inama ishingiye kuri siyansi. Kuba imisigiti, za kiliziya nâ€™amateraniro nâ€™insengero bifunze mu Rwanda no mu bihugu byinshi ku Isi mu rwego rwo kwirinda iki cyorezo ntibibuza abantu kuba Abayisilamu nâ€™Abakirisitu beza.
Abayobozi bâ€™ayo madini bemeye inama zishingiye ku buhanga, ntibibahindura abahakanyi. Babyemeye kuko bashyira mu gaciro, bakirinda amarangamutima yagusha abantu mu rupfu. Nta masengesho nâ€™ibyiringiro byari byakiza cyangwa kworoshya ubukana bwâ€™indwara ku muntu urwaye SIDA cyangwa Ebola cyangwa undi mugera waba uwa virusi cyangwa udukoko (bacteria).
Abahanga bakora imiti bagakora nâ€™inkingo zâ€™indwara bikoreshwa na bose batitaye ku myemerere. Nkuko amadini ahuza abantu batari bake, akanabafasha mu buzima bwabo, abahanga muri siyansi nabo bahurira ku gushakisha icyagirira abantu akamaro.
Inshingano yâ€™abo bahanga ni ugukora imiti nâ€™inkingo byâ€™indwara zisanzwe zizwi nâ€™izimenyekanye vuba. Ndetse ni nabo biga ingamba zakoreshwa mu gukingira abantu ikwirakwira ryâ€™ibyorezo bicyaduka nâ€™indwara zisanzwe.
COVID-19 ntabwo ari cyo cyorezo kibayeho bwa mbere gifata imyanya yâ€™ubuhumekero. Hari ibyorezo bya vuba aha ariko hari nâ€™ibindi byabayeho mbere. Mu 1918 hadutse icyorezo cyâ€™ibicurane bise Influenza. Icyo cyorezo mu myaka ibiri cyishe abantu barenga miliyoni mirongo itanu. Zimwe mu ngamba zafashwe kukirwanya nâ€™ubwo zafashwe bitinze, ni kimwe nâ€™izafashwe ku Isi nyuma yâ€™imyaka irenga 100 hadutse COVID-19.
Aho izo ngamba zubahirijwe, ari icyo gihe cyâ€™imyaka irenga 100 nâ€™ubu ikwirakwira ryâ€™uburwayi byaragabanutse. U Bushinwa, Korea yâ€™Amajyepfo, Singapore, Taiwan nâ€™ahandi bakajije umurego, kandi hari ubucucike bwâ€™abaturage, indwara barayicogoje. Aho biraye nkâ€™u Butaliyani, u Bufaransa no muri Espagne, birirwa bahamba ndetse nâ€™abandi babura gihamba.
Kwirinda biruta kwivuza. Nâ€™ubuzima butarimo kwishyira ukizana mu gihe gito ni cyo gisubizo cyo kurinda umuturanyi inshuti nâ€™umuvandimwe urupfu nâ€™umubabaro bitari ngombwa. Ingamba zafashwe na Leta, ni ku neza ya bose. Kutazubahiriza ni uguhembera icyorezo. Nabyo nâ€™irindi gwingira.

Title: Abacuruzi bongeje ibiciro bitwaje coronavirus bihanangirijwe
Abantu barasabwa kwirinda ibihuha kuri coronavirus
Dr Munyakazi Isaac yirukanywe mu ishyaka PDI
Uko Museveni yayobeje uburari i Kabale ku bibazo biri mu mubano wa Uganda nâ€™u Rwanda
Body:
Nyuma yâ€™inama yo ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 21 Gashyantare 2020 yabereye ku mupaka wa Gatuna, igahuza Perezida Paul Kagame, uwa Uganda Yoweri Museveni, nâ€™abahuza Perezida wa Angola, JoÃ£o LourenÒ«o na mugenzi we wa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo (DRC), Felix Tshisekedi, hagamijwe gushaka umuti ku bibazi bimaze iminsi hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Uganda, Perezida Museveni yabwiye abaturage bâ€™i Kabale ibintu bitangaje.
Nyuma yâ€™inama yo ku wa Gatanu tariki ya 21 Gashyantare 2020 yabereye ku mupaka wa Gatuna, igahuza Perezida Paul Kagame, uwa Uganda Yoweri Museveni, nâ€™abahuza Perezida wa Angola, JoÃ£o LourenÒ«o na mugenzi we wa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo (DRC), Felix Tshisekedi, hagamijwe gushaka umuti ku bibazi bimaze iminsi hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Uganda, Perezida Museveni yabwiye abaturage bâ€™i Kabale ibintu bitangaje.
Ubwo yari mu nzira ataha avuye mu nama, Museveni yagejeje ijambo ku mbaga yâ€™abaturahe mu mujyi wa Kabale.
Nubwo hari ibimenyetso simusiga byagaragarijwe mu nama bishinja guverinoma ya Uganda gutera inkunga umutwe wâ€™iterabwoba wa RNC umaze imyaka ushaka guhungabanya umutekano wâ€™u Rwanda, bigasohoka no mu myanzuro yâ€™inama isaba Uganda guhagarika ibikorwa bya RNC ku butaka bwayo; Museveni yavuze ko ibyo ari ibinyoma, ko Uganda idacumbikiye abayobozi nâ€™abanyamuryango bâ€™uwo mutwe.
Mu byâ€™ukuri yashakaga intambara kandi yakomeje kugaragaza ko azakora ibishoboka byose agatesha agaciro amasezerano ya Luanda, ku kiguzi icyo aricyo cyose.
Perezida Museveni yaciye umurongo na mbere yâ€™uko wino yakoreshejwe ku itangazo rya nyuma yâ€™inama guverinoma ye yasinye, yuma.
Wakumva uburemere bwâ€™uburyo ubutumwa yatanze bwakiriwe i Kampala, urebye mu binyamakuru byo muri Uganda uko byahaye uburemere iyo nkuru, bikayishyira mu zâ€™ibanze.
Ikinyamakuru kinyuzwamo icengezamatwara ryâ€™Urwego rwâ€™Ubutasi bwa Gisirikare muri Uganda (CMI), Chimpreports, ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2020, cyatangaje ko â€œMuseveni yatunze agatoki igisirikare cyâ€™u Rwanda kuba nyirabayazana wâ€™ibibazo muri dipolmasi...â€
Ikinyamakuru cya Leta ya Uganda, New Vision, na cyo ku wa 23 Gashyantare 2020, ku rupapuro rwâ€™ibanze cyatangaje inkuru ijya kumera nkâ€™iyo, ko â€œMuseveni yagaragaje ubwumvikane buke muri FPR nkâ€™imvano yâ€™ifungwa ryâ€™umupaka.â€
Amagambo ya Museveni yari yuzuye ubushotoranyi ku rwego na bamwe mu bamufasha icengezamatwara, bibajije icyamuteye kuvuga ayo magambo adafite ishingiro, aho Chimpreports yanzuye ko â€œMuseveni avuze ayo magambo nyuma yâ€™amasaha make yâ€™inama yâ€™uyu munsi igamije kugaragaza imbaraga nâ€™ukuba umwere ku birego bikomeye.â€
Abakurikiranira hafi politiki yo mu Karere kâ€™Ibiyaga Bigari nâ€™imibanire hagati yâ€™u Rwanda na Uganda mu myaka 25 ishize, bahamya ko amagambo Perezida Museveni yavugiye i Kabale atatunguranye.
Niba yarahisemo kwitandukanya nâ€™amasezerano ya Luanda nkâ€™uko ubutumwa bwe busa nâ€™ububigaragaza, ntibyaba ari ubwa mbere.
Kuva kera Perezida Museveni yagiye yisubiraho ku myanzuro yemeranyijweho hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi, buri gihe iyo yabonaga imbaraga zashyizweho nâ€™abahuza zigiye gutanga umusaruro mwiza. Ubundi igihe cye ntigishidikanywaho.
Mbere yâ€™uko ahurira na Perezida Kagame mu nama yahamagajwe nâ€™uwari Minisitiri wâ€™Iterambere Mpuzamahanga, Claire Short, i Londres mu 2001, nyuma yâ€™ibaruwa igayitse Museveni yandikiye uwo mu minisitiri, Perezida wa Uganda yarigaragaje.
Nkâ€™uko byagaragajwe muri raporo ya International Crisis Group (ICG) ku wa 21 Ukuboza 2001, yasohorewe i Bruxelles nâ€™i Nairobi, Museveni mu buryo bushotorana yagize Maj Gen James Kazini Umugaba wâ€™Ingabo wâ€™agateganyo amusimbuje Lt Gen Jeje Odongo, umunsi umwe mbere yâ€™inama yâ€™i Londres. Ni icyemezo iyi raporo ihamya ko kitari kijyanye nâ€™inyungu za Uganda mu nzira yâ€™ubwiyunge.
Gen Kazini yari yaragaragajwe nâ€™itsinda rihuriweho ryâ€™iperereza ryashyizweho na Perezida Kagame na Museveni nyuma yâ€™intambara yashyamiranyije ibihugu byombi i Kisangani mu 1999, nkâ€™umuntu rukumbi wabaye intandaro yâ€™iyo ntambara.
Iyo raporo yanagaragaje ko â€œKuba Kazini yarasimbuye Odongo bigaragaza ko abayobozi ba Uganda badashaka kwemera uruhare bagize muri uko gushyamirana.â€
Mu rugendo rwo guhosha ikibazo biri hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi ubu, Uganda yashinje u Rwanda ibikorwa byâ€™ubutasi ku butaka bwayo; ibirego byagiye byongererwa imbaraga nâ€™ibinyamakuru byo muri Uganda.
Iki kirego gisa nâ€™aho ari cyo cyonyine Kampala yashingiyeho imyaka yose, bigaragara ko nta gihamya ihari kandi nta shingiro gifite; nticyigeze kigaragara mu nama ya komisiyo ihuriweho nâ€™impande zombi yabereye i Kigali ku wa 14 Gashyantare 2020, ndetse nticyagaragaye mu itangazo rya nyuma ryâ€™inama nâ€™imyanzuro yaryo.
Nâ€™ikibigaragaza kurutaho ni uko icyo kibazo cya Uganda kitigeze kinavugwaho mu nama yo ku wa 21 Gashyantare 2020, i Gatuna.
Bitandukanye nâ€™uko haba mu nama yahuje impande zombi nâ€™abahuza i Kigali nâ€™i Gatuna, ikibazo cyâ€™uko Uganda ishyigikiye kandi itera inkunga RNC cyagarutsweho cyane muri ibyo biganiro byose.
Iyo nama yasabye Uganda gusuzuma ibikorwa byâ€™iterabwoba bya RNC ku butaka bwayo, ibintu â€œbizanasuzumwa kandi bikemezwa na komisiyo ihuriweho yâ€™abaminisitiri ku ishyirwa mu bikorwa ryâ€™amasezerano ya Luanda.â€
Ikintu gikomeye Uganda yagaragaje mu biganiro byose ni ikiswe gufunga umupaka hagati yâ€™ibihugu byombi, aho inama yanzuye ko igihe Uganda izaba yasuzumye ibikorwa bya RNC ndetse igafata â€œingamba zo kubihagarika no gukumira ko byazongera kubahoâ€, umupaka uzongera ugafungurwa.
Ikigaragara ni uko iyo ibiganiro byahuje abakuru bâ€™ibihugu bitaza kuba ku rwego rwa dipolomasi, uruhare rwa Uganda mu bikorwa bya RNC rurigaragaza. Ntibyigaragariza mu itangazo rya nyuma ryâ€™inama, ahubwo mu bitarashyizwemo.
Niba koko harabayeho gushidikanya mu bitekerezo byâ€™abahuza ku ruhare rwa Uganda mu bikorwa bya RNC, umuntu yari gutegereza ko mu itangazo rya nyuma ryâ€™inama yâ€™i Gatuna, abonamo ingingo isaba u Rwanda gufungura umupaka mu gihe igenzura ryari kuba ryemeje ko nta bikorwa bya RNC biri ku butaka bwa Uganda. Ibi ntibyashyizwemo kuko abahuza bari bazi ukuri nyako.
Ibimenyetso bikomeye bishinja Uganda kugira uruhare mu bikorwa bya RNC byahuriranye nâ€™ibinyoma no guhakana kwa Museveni i Kabale, aho ibinyamakuru byose byo muri Uganda byatangaje cyane kuri uwo munsi ko guverinoma ya Museveni yokejwe igitutu nâ€™u Rwanda igahagarika pasiporo ya Charlotte Mukankusi ukuriye dipolomasi mutwe wa RNC, yatanzwe na Uganda ikajya imufasha kuzenguruka isi yose akora ubukangurambaga bwâ€™uyu mutwe wâ€™iterabwoba.
Mukankusi yakundaga kujya i Kampala, urugendo yaherukaga ni urwo muri Mutarama aho yari ajyanwe no kuganira nâ€™abayobozi ba RNC baba muri iki gihugu, no guhura nâ€™abandi bayobozi bakuru muri guverinoma ya Uganda.
Mu mwaka ushize Museveni yemereye ku karubanda ko yahuye na Charlotte Mukankusi nkâ€™ukuriye ibikorwa bya dipolomasi mu mutwe wa RNC.
Igiteye urujijo ni uburyo Museveni atekereza ko ashobora gusibanganya ibyo byose mu minota mike yahagaze mu mujyi umwe, ngo byose abyegeke ku wasagariwe.

Title: Twagiramungu na Rusesabagina mu gihirahiro nyuma yâ€™amakuru yâ€™iyicwa rya Gen Wilson Irategeka
Uburyo Habyarimana yagize ubwoba bwo gutaha ashaka kurara Dar es Salaam
Body:
Mu nyandiko iheruka, nashoje ndarikira abasomyi kuzabagezaho icyo abashobora kuba ari bo bishe JuvÃ©nal Habyarimana banditse bayobya uburari. Kimwe muri ibyo ni aho basobanura igituma yaratashye ijoro nâ€™ubugambanyi bwâ€™Abakuru bâ€™Ibihugu duturanye. Mu byo badasobanura nâ€™icyo baheraho bavuga ko yari yanzwe.
