Kimwe muri ibyo ni aho basobanura igituma yaratashye ijoro nâ€™ubugambanyi bwâ€™Abakuru bâ€™Ibihugu duturanye. Mu byo badasobanura nâ€™icyo baheraho bavuga ko yari yanzwe.
Mu nyandiko ya FAR yo mu Ukuboza 1995, abashinjwa kugira uruhare mu itegurwa nâ€™ishyirwa mu bikorwa byâ€™umugambi wo â€œkwica Perezida Habyarimana no gukorera Jenoside Abahutuâ€ guhera mu 1990 ni: Perezida Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa Uganda nâ€™Ingabo za NRA; Bill Clinton wahoze ari Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika na Leta ye; Perezida Ali Hassan Mwinyi wahoze ayobora Tanzania; Madamu Linda Chalker wari Minisitiri mu Bwongereza; bamwe (batavugwa) mu bategetsi bâ€™u Bubiligi na Perezida Petero Buyoya wâ€™u Burundi nâ€™ingabo ze.
Abandi bashinjwa na FAR ni General Romeo Dallaire wayoboraga ingabo za MINUAR na Colonel Luc Marchal wayoboraga ingabo zâ€™Ababiligi.
Ibiregwa Mwinyi na Museveni
Muri iyo nyandiko ya FAR (1995) kimwe nâ€™iya FDLR (2001) nahisemo kwerekana ubugambanyi buregwa ba Perezida Mwinyi, Museveni, Ababiligi na Jenerali Romeo Dallaire. Aba bose, ku bajenosideri bari ibyitso byâ€™Inkotanyi bari mu mugambi umwe.
Inyandiko za FAR na FDLR ntizica iruhande. Iya ex-FAR ivuga ko ubugambanyi bwa Perezida, Mwinyi na Leta ye ya Tanzania bugaragara.
Ahanini berekana ko bari mu mugambi wo gutuma Perezida Habyarimana ataha bwije. Nkâ€™ikimenyetso cyâ€™ubugambanyi bavuga ko ibaruwa ya mbere itumira inama yerekanaga ko abakuru bâ€™ibihugu bagombaga guhurira Arusha.
Gusa, ngo inama yaje kubera ahatari hateganyijwe mbere, bikaba byarahindutse iminsi ibiri mbere yâ€™uko iba kandi ngo byabaye nta bisobanuro bitanzwe. Kuri bo ngo Arusha hari hafi ya Kigali na Bujumbura kurusha Dar es Salaam inama yari yimuriwe. Ex-FAR bakibaza bati: â€œIbyo ntibyari mu mugambi wo koroshya operasiyo hongerwa uburebure bwâ€™urugendo?â€
Icya kabiri barega Perezida Mwinyi na Leta ye ni ugukerereza nkana inyandiko yâ€™amasezerano yari yakozwe mu rurimi rwâ€™igifaransa, ku buryo ngo byabaye ngombwa ko bayisinyira ku kibuga cyâ€™indege bituma bagenda ijoro. Ibyo ngo Habyarimana yabonaga bibangamiye umutekano we bituma ashaka kurara muri Tanzania igitagaranya.
Inyandiko ya FDLR yo mu 2001 ishimangira ibi ivuga ko Habyarimana yagaragarije mugenzi we Perezida Mwinyi impungenge ku mutekano we, kugera nâ€™aho yamusabye kumwemerera akarara i Dar es Salaam ariko ngo Perezida Mwinyi aranga kuko abashinzwe protocole batari babyiteguye; gusa nâ€™ubwo FDLR yanditse ibi, ntaho umugore wa Habyarimana Agatha Kanziga we nâ€™umuhungu we Jean Luc Habyarimana barabivuga kugeza nâ€™ubu.
Ibindi barega Tanzania nkâ€™ubugambanyi ngo ni ukuba Perezida Mwinyi na Leta ye baranze koherereza ubutumwa bwâ€™akababaro u Rwanda, Perezida wabo amaze kugwa mu ndege. Banashinja iyo Leta kuba yarabaye iya mbere kwemera ubutegetsi bwa FPR-Inkotanyi. Ukuri kwabyo nibo bakuzi njyewe sinakubeshya.
Ubugambanyi barega Perezida Yoweri Museveni bugira aho buhurira nâ€™ibyo barega Perezida Ally Hassan Mwinyi, ni ugukerereza Ikinani Habyarimana ngo atahe ijoro. Bavuga ko Museveni yakererewe kugera aho inama yabereye i Dar es Salaam, akahagera amasaha abiri nâ€™igice, nyuma yâ€™igihe cyateganyijwe, bikaba byaragize ingaruka ku gihe inama irangirira.
Uretse gukererwa, ngo Perezida Museveni yakererezaga nâ€™inama nkana kuko ngo yifataga mu gihe cyâ€™inama agatera urwenya ubundi akanyuzamo akisinziriza, yakanguka agasaba ko bongera gutangira bushya, mbese ngo yishakiraga ko inama iza kurangira bwije.
Uretse ibyo gukerereza inama kimwe na Perezida Mwinyi, ngo ku itariki 10 Mata 1994, hari uwo Perezida Museveni yabwiye ko â€œigihe cyo gukemura ikibazo cyari kigeze.â€ Uwaganiriye na Museveni ntavugwa muri iyi nyandiko ya Ex-FAR.
Ibirego ku Babiligi na Dallaire
Barega Gen. Dallaire na Col. Marchal ko iminsi ibiri mbere yâ€™uko Habyarimana araswa babajije umwe mu ba Ofisiye bâ€™u Rwanda ngo ni nde wasimbura Habyarimana mu gihe agize impanuka agapfa. Banarega kandi MINUAR kuba itararinze umutekano wâ€™Ikibuga cyâ€™Indege bigatuma Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu yicwa.
Leta yâ€™abajenosideri gushinja Ababiligi urupfu rwa Habyarimana ntabwo byakozwe nyuma ya Jenoside. Itangazo rya Minisiteri yâ€™Ububanyi nâ€™Amahanga ya guverinoma ya Kambanda na Sindikubwabo ryo ku wa 15 Mata 1994 risobanura â€œAmakuba u Rwanda rwahuye nayoâ€ wumva mu mvugo iziga bashinja Ababiligi.
Ku itariki ya 20 Mata 1994, uwari uhagarariye u Rwanda muri Zaire, Ambasaderi Etienne Sengegera yagiranye ikiganiro kirambuye na radiyo â€œVoix du Zaireâ€. Muri icyo kiganiro yatinze asobanura ko bazi neza ko ari Ababiligi bishe Perezida Habyarimana. Avuga ko leta ahagarariye ifite ibimenyetso bifatika bituma abyemeza.
Dr. Augustin Ngirabatware wari Minisitiri wâ€™Igenamigambi wâ€™iyo guverinoma yâ€™abajenosideri yagiranye ikiganiro na Radio Africa No 1. ku itariki 27 Mata 1994, muri icyo kiganiro Ngirabatware yashimangiye ko bari bazi neza ko Ingabo za FPR zitari zifite za Missile SAM 7.
Ex-FAR kandi irega abasirikare bâ€™Ababiligi bari muri MINUAR ko ku itariki ya 6 Mata 1994 bakoresheje ibirori muri Hotel Merdien byagera saa yine zâ€™ijoro bagatangira kunywa Champagne, ndetse ngo abo basirikare babwiye abakobwa bâ€™inshuti zabo kuva mu ngo zabo nâ€™imiryango yabo bakimukira muri iyo hotel.
Hari nâ€™ikinyamakuru cya Hutu-Pawa (Inquisiteur Republicain, No. 003195 cyo muri Nzeri 1995) cyanditse ko mbere yâ€™uko indege ya Habyarimana iraswa hari indege za MINUAR zazengurutse cyane hejuru yâ€™i Masaka.
Ubundi bugambanyi barega MINUAR ni uko ngo igihe gito mbere yâ€™uko indege ya Habyarimana iraswa, MINUAR yatanze itegeko ryâ€™uko indege zigwa nâ€™izihaguruka bikorwa mu burasirazuba bwâ€™ikibuga cyâ€™indege (nkâ€™uko bigenda ubu). Ngo babihinduye kugira ngo indege ya Habyarimana itabacika.
Ku munsi indege ya Habyarimana iraswa, FAR ivuga ko yabonye amakuru yâ€™abatangabuhamya bizewe bababwira ko babonye imodoka yâ€™ijipe yâ€™Abasirikare bâ€™Ababiligi bari muri MINUAR yagenze i Masaka inshuro nyinshi. Iyo modoka ngo yarimo abasirikare babiri, yacaracaye hagati yâ€™Umujyi wa Kabuga nâ€™ikiraro gito kiri kuri Cumi nâ€™icyenda. Ngo aho kuri Cumi nâ€™icyenda bahahagaze inshuro eshatu.
Mu yandi makuru yizewe ngo babonye, ba basirikare babiri baraje bahagarara kuri Cumi nâ€™icyenda saa mbiri nâ€™igice (20:30). Ngo â€œnyuma yâ€™iminota ibiri cyangwa itatu, bumvise ikintu giturikiye ku gasozi ka Masaka (Rusheshe). Nyuma yâ€™indi minota ibiri cyangwa itatu, hamanutse amajipi abiri yiruka cyane, ava i Rusheshe agana mu Mujyi wa Kigali atwawe nâ€™Ababiligi.â€
Andi makuru yizewe bavuga ko babonye ni ayo FAR bamenye ko Abasirikare bâ€™Ababiligi bahanyuze bari bamaze iminsi batata ako gace. Bemeza ko nta wundi bashinja ihanurwa ryâ€™indege ya Habyarimana uretse Ababiligi kubera ko nyuma yâ€™urupfu rwa Habyarimana nta yindi modoka yagarutse muri ako gace.
Bati: â€œNta gushidikanya ko ari Ababiligi barashe indege ya Perezidaâ€¦â€ kuko abatuye ako gace, â€œuwo mugoroba babonye abasirikare bâ€™Ababiligi bagerageza ibitwaro bihambaye.â€
Ikindi ngo cyabemeje ko ari abo Babiligi ngo ni uko â€œubundi bagendanaga nâ€™Abajandarume bâ€™Abanyarwanda, uwo mugoroba bakaba bari bonyine.â€ Ikindi cyababwiye ko bari Ababiligi ni uko ngo ari bo bonyine mu bazungu ba MINUAR bavugaga Igifaransa.
Hari nâ€™uwatanze amakuru ko mbere yâ€™uko indege ya Perezida iraswa Ababiligi batandatu bazengurukaga muri ako gace guhera saa kumi nâ€™ebyiri zâ€™umugoroba bahagurutse bagana i Kigali kandi ko bya bitwaro babonye (bashingiye ku byo babonye mu bitabo) ari â€œibirasa za missileâ€.
Hari kandi nâ€™amakuru yâ€™ubutasi bavuga ko babonye ku wa 14 Gashyantare 1994, aho Ofisiye wâ€™Umubiligi yabwiye mugenzi we muri FAR ko Inkotanyi ziri i Kigali muri CND zifite intwaro nyinshi zirimo na missile yo mu bwoko bwa SAM 7.
Umwanzuro
Niba hari ugushakisha amakuru yâ€™iyicwa rya Perezida Habyarimana, inzira yonyine ni ukwegeranya ibyavuzwe na Komisiyo Mutsinzi ukabihuza nâ€™ibyo ex-FAR nâ€™amashumi yabo bavuga cyangwa bandika.
Ubugambanyi babuvuga ku bandi, umugambi bakawushyira kuri FPR nâ€™abo bita inshuti zabo. Icyo badasubiza ni icyo Habyarimana yatinyaga bikagera nâ€™aho asaba kurara i Dar es Salaam igitaraganya.
Ukoze iperereza ntusesengure ibinyoma biba mu bajenosideri nâ€™imiryango irimo uwa Habyarimana, uba wahushije. Niko abarimo Pierre Pean, Judi Rever, Jane Corbin, Andreau Merelles nâ€™abandi bamize bunguri ibyo batekewemo bakirinda gusoma inyandiko nkoresha kandi ziri mu ruhame.

Title: Ibikurangira uwishe JuvÃ©nal Habyarimana
Body:
Iyo ushaka kumenya ahari ukuri guhishwa, wumva ubwinshi bwâ€™ibinyoma bivugwa ku kintu kimwe. Ibi nibyo biri ku rupfu rwa Perezida JuvÃ©nal Habyarimana. Niba hari uzi kandi ukwiye kubazwa urwo rupfu ni umugore we nâ€™abana (wenda batari bose) nâ€™abasirikare bakuru bâ€™u Rwanda rwâ€™icyo gihe.
Iyo ushaka kumenya ahari ukuri guhishwa, wumva ubwinshi bwâ€™ibinyoma bivugwa ku kintu kimwe. Ibi nibyo biri ku rupfu rwa Perezida JuvÃ©nal Habyarimana. Niba hari uzi kandi ukwiye kubazwa urwo rupfu ni umugore we nâ€™abana (wenda batari bose) nâ€™abasirikare bakuru bâ€™u Rwanda rwâ€™icyo gihe.
Ku itariki ya 6 Mata 2019, imwe mu maradiyo akorera kuri murandasi yagiranye ikiganiro nâ€™umwe mu bana bato ba Perezida Habyarimana witwa Jean Luc Habyarimana. Muri icyo kiganiro, uwo muhungu yatangaje, ko ku itariki ya 3 Mata 1994, iwabo mu Gasiza bakiriye ubutumwa budasanzwe buzanywe na Jacques Roger Booh-Booh wari nâ€™Intumwa yihariye yâ€™Umunyamabanga Mukuru wâ€™Umuryango wâ€™Abibumbye mu Rwanda (LONI).
Jean Luc ngo yiyumviye Booh-Booh abwira se ko aje amuzaniye ubutumwa buvuye ku Mugaba wâ€™Ingabo zâ€™Inkotanyi, Paul Kagame. Ngo â€œUzambwirire Perezida Habyarimana ko nzamwicaâ€. Uwabazaga, Serge Ndayizeye, yagaragaje ko ari bwo bwa mbere ibyo bintu bivuzwe, nyuma yâ€™imyaka 25. Ariko si byo.
Ibyâ€™ubwo butumwa budasanzwe, Agatha Kanziga, umugore wa Habyarimana akaba na nyina wa Jean Luc, yari yarabibwiye ikinyamakuru Jeune Afrique, gisohoka muri No 1738-1739 yo ku wa 28 Mata-15 Gicurasi 1994. Kanziga yavuze ko bari batumiye Jacques Roger Booh-Booh ngo basangire pasika yabaye kuri iyo tariki ya 3 Mata. Kanziga akavuga ko iyo ntumwa yihariye yasubiriyemo umugabo we inshuro eshatu ko yatumwe na Kagame ko azamwica akoresheje uburyo ubwo ari bwo bwose.
Ibyâ€™ubwo butumwa bwitwa ko bwatanzwe nâ€™Intumwa yihariye yâ€™Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni wari wahindutse iyâ€™Umugaba wâ€™Inkotanyi yabisubiriyemo Jean Kambanda bahuriye i Nairobi-Kenya mu 1995 anabyandika mu gitabo cye â€˜Rwanda face Ã  lâ€™Apocalypse du 1994â€™ bisobanura u Rwanda mu Mperuka ya 1994.
Mbere yâ€™uko bisubirwamo na Jean Luc, byari byaranditswe nâ€™inyandiko ndende yâ€™ingabo zâ€™u Rwanda zatsinzwe (FAR) yiswe â€œContribution des FAR Ã  la recherche de la vÃ©ritÃ© sur le drame rwandais - La guerre dâ€™octobre 1990 et la catastrophe dâ€™avril 1994â€ bishaka kuvuga ko batangaga umusanzu wo kumenya ukuri ku byabaye mu Rwanda nâ€™ibyago byo muri Mata 1994. Byananditswe mu nyandiko ya FDLR bise â€˜Drame Rwandaisâ€™ yo mu 2001. Ibyâ€™ubwo butumwa bwo kuri Pasika iminsi itatu mbere byaje gusubirwamo na Col. Aloys Ntiwiragabo mu nyandiko ebyiri zitandukanye ariko zuzuzanya mu 2015.
Ibyâ€™iyo tariki ya 3 Mata si bike. Uwo munsi nibwo radio RTLM yatangaje ko hagiye kuba akantu uhereye ku ya 4 Mata 1994 ariko bagasimbuka iya 6 Mata bakajya ku ya 7 nâ€™iya 8 zâ€™uko kwezi aho bavuze ko hazaba imirwano. Icyo cyiswe â€œakantuâ€ byaje kugaragara ko ari ukwicwa kwa Habyarimana nâ€™abo bari kumwe.
Ari inyandiko ya FAR yo mu Ukuboza 1995 nâ€™iza Col. Ntiwiragabo zo mu 2015, zombi zivuga ko kuri iyo itariki ya 3 Mata, hari Lieutenant Hebron wâ€™Umubiligi wari mu ngabo za Loni mu Rwanda (MINUAR) wavugiye mu kabari ko Perezida Habyarimana azicwa.
Ko ku itariki ya 21 Ugushyingo 1993 babonye amakuru yâ€™ubutasi agaragaza ko hari agaco kâ€™Inkotanyi kari kacengeye muri Kigali gafite umugambi wo gushimuta no kwica Perezida Habyarimana. Undi mugambi bamenye ni uwo kwica Habyarimana umunsi arahira hanyuma ukaburizwamo nâ€™Abajepe babaye maso.
Ngo kuri 29 Mutarama 1994 Inkotanyi zari ziyemeje kwica cyangwa gufata mpiri Habyarimana bamukuye mu biro bye cyangwa mu rugo rwe i Kanombe. Ngo hari hashize icyumweru, ni ukuvuga kuri 22 Mutarama, Umugaba wâ€™Inkotanyi yandikiwe nâ€™uwitwa Zubere ko kugira ngo kwicwa Habyarimana bishoboke ari uko haboneka abasirikare 100 muri Kigali bambara gisivili.
Ku munsi wâ€™iya 25 Gashyantare bari bamenye umugambi wo kuzana imvururu zishingiye ku moko bikozwe na Faustin Twagiramungu wari warateganyijwe kuzaba Minisitiri wâ€™Intebe muri guverinoma yâ€™inzibacyuho yaguye. Ibyo akabikora abikorera FPR-Inkotanyi.
Amakuru yandi yâ€™ubutasi yemeza umugambi wo kwica Habyarimana bikozwe nâ€™Inkotanyi, yabonetse ku itariki ya 26 Gashyantare 1994 nyuma yâ€™impfu za Minisitiri Felicien Gatabazi, wari nâ€™Umunyamabanga Mukuru wâ€™Ishyaka PSD ndetse na Martin Bucyana wari Perezida wa CDR. Muri ubwo butasi ngo bamenye ko Inkotanyi zitashimishijwe no kudasubiranamo kwâ€™abaturage ngo hemezwa gukomeza umugambi wo kwica Habyarimana nkâ€™uburyo bwo kurakaza Abahutu.
Ibyâ€™ubutegetsi kumenya amakuru yakabaye yizewe ku rupfu rwâ€™umukuru wâ€™igihugu ntabwo yari ayo babwirwaga nâ€™ubonetse wese. Muri za nyandiko cyane cyane iza Col. Ntiwiragabo, wari ushinzwe ubutasi muri FAR, yemeza ko ku itariki ya 19 Werurwe 1994 ari i Ngondore mu nama yahuje Ingabo za Leta (FAR) nâ€™inkotanyi yamenewe irindi banga ryo kwicwa kwa Habyarimana.
Banemeza ko Col. Ntiwiragabo yihereranywe nâ€™abasirikare bakuru mu Nkotanyi ari bo Colonel Stanislas Biseruka na Lieutenant Colonel Caesar Kayizari (ubu ni Lieutenant General) bamubwira ko Perezida Habyarimana agomba kwicwa kuko yari imbogamizi ibuza Inkotanyi kugera ku butegetsi. Ngo banamubwiye ko inzitizi yari ukubura ibyitso muri FAR.
Umunsi umwe mbere, ku ya 2 Mata, ngo FAR bari bafite amakuru yemewe yâ€™ubutasi ko Inkotanyi zifite umugambi wo kwica abaturage, ba ofisiye bâ€™Abasirikare byâ€™umwihariko Umugaba wa FAR hakanicwa abayobozi bâ€™amashyaka ashamikiye kuri MRND. Ibyo bitero ngo byagombaga kubera rimwe kandi bikaba hagati yâ€™itariki 3-9 Mata.
Igwingira rigaragara
Iyo tuvuze igwingira ubibona muri ibi bandika. Perezida Paul Kagame azwi nkâ€™umuntu ushyira mu gaciro, nâ€™umuntu uzi kurema no guhamya ingamba (strategist). Gutekereza ko yaba afite umugambi ukomeye nkâ€™uwo bamutwerera, akawushyira hanze bigera nâ€™aho atuma umuntu ukomeye muri Loni?
Nyuma yâ€™imyaka 26, hari abatazi Jacques Roger Booh-Booh nâ€™icyo yari ashinzwe. Nkâ€™Intumwa yihariye yâ€™Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa Loni, ni nawe wari ushinzwe mu rwego rwa Politiki ingabo za MINUAR harimo na Jenerali Romeo Dallaire. Waba uri muntu ki ugatuma ushinzwe kubahiriza amahoro anahagarariye Loni mu Rwanda, umwereka ko ufite umugambi wo kuburizamo ayo mahoro?
Iyo biba byo, ntabwo Booh-Booh yari guceceka keretse iyo aba na we ari icyitso cyâ€™Inkotanyi. Ntabwo Booh-Booh yari kubona amakuru nkâ€™ayo (mbere yâ€™urupfu) ngo areke kuyashyira muri raporo batangaga buri munsi i New York. Ntabwo bishoboka ko Habyarimana yari gupfa uhagarariye Loni yarabibwiwe mbere ngo areke kugira icyo abivugaho. Kugeza ubu, ayo makuru ari kwa Kanziga nâ€™umuhungu we Jean Luc. Nta nâ€™undi ubyemera uretse abo bafatanyije umugambi wa Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Nari i Kigali mu Rwanda ba Perezida Habyarimana na Cyprien Ntaryamira bahanurwa mu ndege. Nta na rimwe muri Radiyo Rwanda cyangwa RTLM bigeze bavuga ku byo ushinzwe ubutasi mu ngabo za FAR yabwiwe nâ€™Abasirikare bakuru bâ€™Inkotanyi.
Kuva ku itariki ya 19 Werurwe kugera ku ya 3 Mata harimo igihe kirenga ibyumweru bibiri. Nta buryo atari kuba yarabibwiye Habyarimana na Kanziga kugeza ubwo Booh-Booh atanga ubutumwa ku Mukuru wâ€™Igihugu mu munsi mukuru yatumiwemo. Agatha Kanziga yivugiye ko ari umuryango we bari bamutumiye mu Gasiza.
Nongere mbaze nti, utagera ntagereranya? Uwatanze amakuru yâ€™ubutasi ko Inkotanyi zishobora gushimuta cyangwa gufata mpiri Perezida wâ€™Igihugu yumvaga ari ibintu bishoboka? Niba yarumvaga ari ibintu bishoboka, Habyarimana yari ariho atari ho.
Ibi byose iyo ubitekereje, wumva impamvu bashoboraga kwandika mu kinyamakuru cyabo Kangura, baha Umukuru wâ€™Igihugu igihe agomba kuzicwa. Yagombaga gupfa muri Werurwe 1994, yicwa muri Mata uwo mwaka. Binasobanura impamvu nyuma yâ€™iminsi ibiri nâ€™igice gusa arashwe umuryango we urimo umugore nâ€™abana bahambiriye utwangushye bakigendera basize umurambo we aho.
Mu guhisha no guhishira abishe Habyarimana, abayobozi ba FAR (1995) bemeza ko FPR-Inkotanyi yafashijwe nâ€™abasirikare bâ€™Ababiligi bari muri MINUAR, bakanashinja Tanzania na Uganda kuba ari bo batumye yaragarutse bwije akicwa saa mbili nâ€™igice (20:30) zâ€™ijoro. Ibyo ni ahâ€™ubutaha!
